plot: On the eve of the Great War, a cavalry captain who despises the opposite sex falls in love with a wealthy young lady.

title: Love and the First Railroad
plot: A country postmaster and stagecoach operator in 1838 is wary about his daughter's involvement with a construction foreman building the first German railroad there.

title: Decoy
plot: Delia Donovan is the decoy and works for a pair of jewel thieves. Her job is to seduce Viktor, who has in his possession a necklace of priceless emeralds, which he is bringing from Turkey to Marseille for his father. The criminals plan to steal the jewels on the boat with the collaboration of the crooked captain. Viktor's girl friend Sybil sees through the devious Delia and when there is an explosion on board and much confusion, she is the one to come to Viktor's rescue.

title: Marodörer
plot: Liquor smuggling in the Stockholm archipelago.

title: Ein Mädchen mit Prokura
plot: A Prokurist in a bank is suspected of murdering her boss and refuses to take the stand in her defense, because she believes she has to cover for the boss' nephew.

title: Ein Mädel wirbelt durch die Welt
plot: A woman is torn between two different composers, within the larger conflict between traditional classical and the newer contemporary popular music.

title: Nur nicht weich werden, Susanne! - Eine Groteske aus vergangener Zeit
plot: In the depression era unemployed Susanne tries to break into movies by working as an extra. She is ‚hired' to be kidnapped in a PR stunt that is supposed to hush over a suicide scandal. This soon gets her a real role in an artistic film.

title: Oberwachtmeister Schwenke
plot: A pretty girl helps a popular Berlin policeman solve the murders of a woman he knew and the crooked banker the victim worked for.

title: Prinzessin Turandot
plot: The age old legend of a Chinese princess whose suitors are beheaded if they fail to answer a tricky riddle she has deliberately chosen so as to avoid getting married.

title: La provincialina
plot: Simultaneously filmed Italian version of the German production, Die Unschuld von Lande, in which a village maiden gets her first chance to become a star on the big city stage.

title: Regine
plot: Engineer Frank Reynolds returns to his Heimatland, where he finds a blue diamond in Regine. But she has a brother who is not a diamond at all.

title: Rosen aus dem Süden
plot: Johann Strauss helps the business of a Viennese wine merchant and his daughter by showing up to conduct the orchestra at a party.

title: Bashful Felix
plot: The traveling salesman for a bathing suit company has trouble getting business until he meets a girl willing to take off her clothes and act as a model.Misunderstandings and complications ensue.

title: Seconda B
plot: Film set in the 1910s, in an Italian school. A male school teacher falls in love with the female gymnastics teacher at the school. She is attracted to him, but their students attempt to sabotage the prospective romance.

title: Lady of Paradise
plot: An old Jewish moneylender takes in a poor, lonely young girl. But one day, the girl falls in love with a young man and announces that she wants to leave. The moneylender doesn't take it well.

title: Song at Eventide
plot: 1934 British musical about a top cabaret singer who is blackmailed in a scandal that threatens to ruin her and her family.

title: Playing with Fire
plot: A smart wife cures her husband of his infatuation with a beautiful singer.

title: Man's Way with Women
plot: Olof Koskela, a family's only son, is driven from home when he wants to marry the wrong girl. He takes a job as a floater. His reputation as a womanizer goes far and wide. When he meets the proud Kyllikki, he enters into a bet to defeat the mighty rapids while standing on a log.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Turandot, princesse de Chine
plot: It is about a Chinese princess whose suitors are beheaded if they fail to solve a tricky riddle she has chosen to avoid marriage.

title: Zwischen zwei Herzen
plot: A wealthy middle aged gentleman discovers the girl he has supported, thinking she was his child out of wedlock, is no relation, and decides to marry her.

title: All for the Dog's Sake
plot: In this popular canine comedy, a man who doesn't especially like dogs is required to take care of one, as a stipulation of a sizeable inheritance.

title: Dark World
plot: It is a psychological drama involving conflict between two brothers.

title: The Trip to Youth
plot: The not-quite-so-young Baron Trautenegg invites an all-girl dancing group to his country house, only to fall in love with the leading lady. After an unsuccessful marriage proposal to her, he decides to get a makeover in Vienna to increase his chances. While he is away, his spitting-image much-younger nephew arrives, to the astonishment of all--the Baron appears to have been really successful with his makeover. Multiple confusions and complications ensue.

title: Frischer Wind aus Kanada
plot: A wholesome youth returns from Canada to the Fatherland, to rescue his father's business from a crooked accountant and a scheming lawyer.

title: El gato montés
plot: Soleá and Juanillo are two gypsy children that swear they will be together from always. One day, Juanillo escapes from prison where he was serving time for killing a man who had outraged Soleá and she seeks the protection of El Macareno.

title: Grabbarna i 57:an
plot: The life of the residents at Alpgatan 57 in Stockholm.

title: The Saint and Her Fool
plot: Period melodrama about a princess growing up and finding worthy love, despite the machinations of an evil stepmother.

title: Jimmy Boy
plot: An elevator attendant at a London hotel foils a gang of spies.

title: Die klugen Frauen
plot: Simultaneously filmed German language version of the French classic La Kermesse Heroique, in which women of a 17th century Flanders town ,after the men have run off, win over the invading Spanish by collaborating and offering hospitality.

title: Liebeslied
plot: An opera tenor replaces a humble performer in a honky tonk show and wins the heart of the soprano.

title: Little Sinner
plot: In this love triangle, two comrades working at a Berlin auto repair place fall out over a waitress they both want.The only way Rudi can think of winning away Erika from Hanni is to badmouth her to his rival.

title: Mein Leben für Maria Isabell
plot: As the Austro-Hungarian empire comes closer to defeat in the Great War, a young lieutenant tries to rescue the standards of his Maria Isabell regiment from falling into enemy hands.

title: Monte Criollo
plot: Lucy is a woman of shady past who convinces Argüello and Carlos to install an illegal gambling hall on a cabaret that worked legally. When Argüello is interested romantically in her, it rejects it because it is attracted by Carlos, a womanizer singer. The obsession for her leads Argüello to cheat in the game that he holds with Carlos and manages to ruin him, but finally both fight and Argüello dies stabbed but without denouncing his aggressor to recover his self-esteem as a professional player.—Sebastian Incaurgarat

title: Hen Pecked Husbands
plot: Two country husbands become real men by turning the tables on their wives.

title: Posledniy port
plot: On the struggle of the communist sailors with the White Guards and the German occupiers in the Crimea during the civil war. Based on the play The Death of the Squadron (Gibel eskadry, 1933) by Aleksandr Korneychuk (Ukrainian: Oleksandr Evdkimovich Korniychuk) (1905-1972).

title: Punks Arrives from America
plot: A German who has been away too long in America and has lost all of his money needs to prove himself to his fellow citizens,which he does by foiling the robbery of his uncle and then marrying his sweetheart.

title: Le roman d'un jeune homme pauvre
plot: A ruined aristocrat becomes a steward for Nouveaux riches..

title: The Foolish Virgin
plot: An aristocrat's daughter who wants to participate in a small town passion play meets a near starving artist from Munich.

title: Die Werft zum Grauen Hecht
plot: A lowly mechanic flees his former girlfriend.

title: Al margen de la ley
plot: Film based on the crime at the "Expreso de Andalucía" (Andalusian Express)

title: Continental Atmosphere
plot: Angelo Musco leaves his small town in Sicily to go to Rome for an operation. Once there, he decides he likes that continental air and proceeds to acquire a veneer of same...and also acquires a dancer, sporting-and-claiming an even-larger dose of Continental Veneer. They return together to Sicily with Musco under the impression she comes from the continent. Leda's clothes, manners, habits and flirting ways start a small revelation-style revolution, which is not to Musco's liking. He ships Leda back to Rome, but not before learning that he has been taken in by a Scilian native, as Leda was born in a near-by town.—Les Adams <longhorn1939@suddenlink.net>

title: Befehl ist Befehl
plot: In this comedy, a former Army sergeant tries to make it as a civilian.

title: The Big Noise
plot: A clerk in an oil company is promoted ostensibly to take the blame when it looks like the bosses' dodgy dealings will be found out by the authorities. Instead, he takes over and makes a success of everything.

title: El castigador castigado
plot: Sonorized version of the silent film Don Juan Tenorio (1922).

title: Abduction
plot: To get her young mother to pay more attention to the husband as well as the children, an 18 year old stages her own kidnapping.

title: My Life Is at Stake
plot: A singer and blackmailer is shot.Did his former fiancee, an actress, do it, or was it her lawyer husband, or a friend of theirs?

title: Die große und die kleine Welt
plot: The taxi driver Fritz gets to know the millionaire-heiress Iris and marries her against the wishes of her family. They live together in a small apartment and are very happy. But Fritz wants to offer Iris more.

title: Hannerl und ihre Liebhaber
plot: A Young Lady receives a proposal, but she ist not Interessed. She ist waiting for some exciting offer, that will perhaps never come. But ... In the meantime she is practising singing. And of course, ist having fun with her mate Mizzi. so they enjoy and visit the 'Heurigen' (they are fromm Vienna). 'Excellenz', ist the man called, who will win her Heart. He ist an pioneer, technician and a very Importamt person, but bored about the society, he ist in. He wants to have a nice young natural girlfriend, but doesn't know, where he could get in touch with this sort of girls, he ist looking for! Frau von Stein tells him to Look at 'Heurigen', where the action is!—aignereveline

title: Janssons frestelse
plot: In the 1928 silent film version, Baron von Werner and Gunnar Jansson are in a dispute over property rights. Inga, the baron's daughter, arrives home from France and is soon interested in Jansson, her father's archival, and tempers flare. Based on the play by Sigurd Wallén. In contrast, the 1936 version has Sigurd Wallén not in a role as a director, but cast as John Jansson, a long-time employee of a banking company and family man. When the company ends up in liquidity crisis - due to careless handling and speculation with the company's finances by Jansson's unscrupulous boss, director Holger Linder - the bank wants Jansson to take over the management of the company, and the situation further becomes more complicated.—yt

title: Konfetti
plot: During Carnival Hanni borrows a dress from the fashion store she works in. At the masked party she catches sight of her employer and runs away, meeting Helmut and a professor whom she asks to stand in as her husband to escape persistent Helmut. The three run into a night adventure.—BSK

title: Kvartetten som sprängdes
plot: The members of a string quartet in a small town engage themselves in share speculation.

title: Onkel Bräsig
plot: The clever Zacharias Bräsig is a good friend to all and tries to help out, where he can. Bräsig also meddles in the relationships of young people, so that by the end of the film, there's a double marriage.

title: Spiel an Bord
plot: On a German steamer en route to New York stowaway Viktor and office girl Susanne fall in love while they get caught up in Marquis de la Tour's elaborate scheme to steal collector Henning's valuable stamp collection.

title: The Unrecognized Man of the World
plot: The author of a series of love stories based on his own experiences meets a country girl who can't stand his writing, in this Bavarian comedy which culminates in a grand masquerade ball.

title: When the Cock Crows
plot: Early morning romantic excursions in a North German village under the thumb of a crusty old mayor.

title: The Avenger
plot: Dated and uneven melodrama about a reformed criminal who marries into high society, only to be forced by a former accomplice to steal from the factory where he now works.

title: Ball im Metropol
plot: At a ball at the Metropol, the married Margit gives a harmless kiss to a one-time friend from her childhood and cousin, Eberhard. The two notice, however, that Margit's ill and jealous husband observed them from a distance.

title: The Beaver Coat
plot: Adaptation of a turn of the century play: A pompous baron brags that he will eradicate a nest of poachers, but goes after harmless free thinkers instead.

title: Between Two Worlds
plot: A lady pianist is torn between the cellist of her quartet and an exotic Indian maharajah she meets on a tour by the troupe.The maharajah, however, has trouble forgetting his dead former love.

title: Gabriele: eins, zwei, drei
plot: Two women from differing classes of society trade dresses to see how the other side lives: a stewardess meets up with a police chief and an heiress finds her engineer.

title: Gefährliches Spiel
plot: A resourceful young lady saves her father, a baron, from jail for misappropriation of bank funds, with the help of a handsome doctor who can cover the debt.

title: The Happiest Married Couple in Vienna
plot: An Austrian-American millionaire offers a huge sum of money to the couple in Vienna who can show they have the happiest marriage, an example he hopes will encourage his own unwed daughter to find a husband herself.

title: Izzat
plot: Based in Central India, a story about struggle of a young man belonging to Bheel (an adivasi) tribe against the exploitation of his people by stronger Maratha tribe.

title: Jeevan Prabhat
plot: In this tale of rural caste divisions, polygamy is added to the theme in this story of Uma, born in an orthodox Brahmin family. To the despair of her parents she values her friendship with low-caste potters. Especially with Ranu. When she marries Nandlal, a man from her own caste, her potter friends are happy for her - until they learn that Nandlal is taking a second wife, Padma, with Uma's consent. The problem is that Uma is thought to be infertile. Uma returns to her parents' home mainly because Nandlal is paying no attention to his new wife, and when she returns she meets Ramu again. Nandlal overhears a conversation between Ramu and Uma and, when Uma suddenly discovers that she is pregnant after all, he doubts her fidelity.—Sujit R. Varma

title: Die Landstreicher
plot: Two members of a traveling troupe are reduced to the status of hoboes.They pretend to be a famous composer and his colleague, to improve their prospects.

title: Millionenerbschaft
plot: The daughter of a rich American entices a young German but he does the right thing and gives her up for a German girl. In a separate story thread, a sports instructor inherits a fortune after the death of his uncle.

title: Pusztai szél
plot: Set in the 1880's, Ferenc Kiss, a bandit, has had a long relationship with innkeeper Maria Lazar. The latter falls in love with Paul Javor, a mounted patrolman. But she knows Kiss will take some form of reprisal. Kiss attempts to kill Javor and Lazar, believing that he has, turns him over the the authorities.—Les Adams <longhorn1939@suddenlink.net>

title: Ryska snuvan
plot: Kalle Brodin, the leader of the Swedish communists, don't know what to do with the directives that comes from Moscow.

title: Grounds for Divorce
plot: Notorious gambler Toni and his wife hit a low point when he loses all their money. Their lawyer Werkmann initiates a plan to hire penniless Anny to pose with Toni in a compromising situation, thus creating a sufficient cause for a divorce.

title: Pretty Miss Schragg
plot: Prussian king Frederick the Great advises a young settler along the eastern frontier who is going to be married to the daughter of a state counselor, to be a model farmer and raise plenty of children.

title: When Women Keep Silent
plot: Curt serenades his wife Charlott from the garden without her recognizing him. When she later doesn't refer to the incident he assumes that she is falling for the 'unknown' suitor and deliberately puts a notorious womanizer on her trail.

title: King of the Edelweiss
plot: A farmer shelters his brother, a wood carver, from the police who want him for the murder of a local official.In a subplot, a mountain girl finds her soulmate in a young forester.

title: Equatore
plot: In a dockyards in Kenya, the boss plants suspicions on an Italian worker who he thinks has designs on his wife.

title: The Jumping Jack
plot: Steffi is wooed by honest co-worker Peter and their flirtatious boss Paul. She likes Peter but goes on a date with Paul. In a jealous fit Peter leaves her. Steffi is desperate and tries hard to convince him that they belong together.

title: Jwala
plot: This period fantasy is a tale about a good general Angar (Chandramohan) who is corrupted by ambition. Echoing 'Macbeth', the loyal Angar is told by the witch Kuntala (Ashalata) that his king (Bulbule) shall die and that he shall be king instead. Angar then kills that king and seizes power. Departing from 'Macbeth', Angar's wife Mangala (Ratnaprabha) and his friend Tarang (Chandrakant) do not approve and they eventually join forces with the people against Angar.—Sujit R. Varma

title: Battles in the Shadow
plot: Foreign spies steal the formula of a new explosive

title: Narren im Schnee
plot: The ski season is in full swing in a Tyrolean mountain village. Everyone is crazy excited, whether up in the hut, in the Grand Hotel or in the run-down "Berghof".

title: Petermann ist dagegen
plot: Kraft Durch Freude (Power through Joy) was a Nazi program offering working class people affordable vacations on steamers.On one of these voyages, a grumpy old man named Petermann is transformed into a nice chap.

title: Prinzessin Sissy
plot: Sissy (a character Romy Schneider would later popularize in the 50s) is Duke Maximilian of Bavaria's favorite daughter.The gift of a necklace,meant for her, falls into the hands of a crooked circus director.

title: Star of the Sea
plot: A fisherman with a beautiful voice is heard by the owners of a record company and signed. He falls for the manager but, when he understands that the interest of women is purely professional, he abandons everything.

title: Another Experience
plot: In this comedy, a popular stage tenor can't stay away from his female admirers, until his wife threatens to divorce him.

title: Die barmherzige Lüge
plot: After an explorer disappears and his wife dies on a Mongolia expedition, the man's mistress who was also with them returns to Germany and poses as the wife.When a savvy blackmailer threatens her, she is tried for murder.

title: Freed Hands
plot: A German peasant woman is determined to succeed as a sculptor and ,though she has a child out of wedlock, spurns chances to set up a marriage and continues to pursue her art instead, in the stimulating new climate of Italy.

title: Casanova heiratet
plot: After successfully starring as Casanova on stage Gregor escapes to his country estate but repeats his stage affairs in real life with actress Steffie, feisty matron Johanna and farm girl Gertrud who is the first to really touch his heart.

title: Le corsaire
plot: In Hollywood, actors play in a film featuring an 18th century pirate.

title: Ek Hi Raasta
plot: The orphan and shipwreck survivor Raja works as a coolie forming a trio of friends with Mangoo, a pickpocket, and Vithal, a hansom cab driver. Mala and her father come to the city where she is kidnapped by Banke and sold to a rich man while her father accuses Mangoo of theft. Mangoo kills the father. Mala escapes and finds shelter with Raja, with whom she falls in love. The problem with the trio increase when they enlist in the army for WW2. The film opposes religious faith to atheistic fatalism (the latter exemplified by Mangoo whose mother dies in accident and he becomes a killer) and dares to present a couple openly living together as Mala stubbornly rejects the pressures of her stepmother and her villainous cousin Madan.—Sujit R. Varma

title: Fanfulla da Lodi
plot: The life of Fanfulla, famed knight in Italy of the 1500s, known for his acts of gallantry and courage.

title: Fascino
plot: In the aftermath of a fire, a woman loses her voice.It is years later when she recovers it as well as the courage to respond to the love of a fellow musician.

title: The People of the Hogbo Farm
plot: Mean farmer Ola Berg reigns at Högbogården and endures a loveless relationship with his wife Karin.

title: Follie del secolo
plot: A nobleman finds out that his daughter's husband betrays her and decides to help her.

title: Földindulás
plot: Hungary between the two wars. Strict laws regulate everyday life. A family is only allowed one child. Julis is pregnant again. Janos and Julis already have a son, Józsika.

title: Die Geliebte
plot: Lieutenant von Warp falls head over heels for Terese. He wants to marry her and is willing to give up his career in the Imperial Army to be with her. After he gets to know about a past affair between the bride and a comrade, the story takes a dramatic turn.

title: Herr husassistenten
plot: Vicke Lundin is a car mechanic in a garage where the owner is a brutal and selfish. With him, Vicke argues about the bills the customers have to pay.

title: Three on a Honeymoon
plot: When Dr. Müller is delayed and postpones his own wedding his furious bride Inge leaves him and goes to see her aunt, picking up smart Fred on the way who poses as her husband since Inge is too embarrassed to talk about her busted nuptials.

title: Home from Home
plot: After being unjustly convicted, a man who is content in prison because he's away from his nagging wife, is pardoned and released. He then makes efforts to get back inside prison again.

title: Hummel - Hummel
plot: A Hamburg businessman's romantic youth comes back to embarrass him on the eve of his daughter's marriage.

title: In the Country Fell a Star
plot: An American starlet inflames two Italian peasants who forget about their respective fiancees; one of them even thinks of marrying her and begins to plan the engagement banquet. When the girl decides to leave the countryside, harmony returns.—Salvatore Santangelo <pappagone2@libero.it>

title: Julieta y Romeo
plot: Two teenagers fall in love, but their feuding families and fate itself cause the relationship to end in tragedy.

title: Der lustige Witwenball
plot: In this slapstick comedy, two women who own rival beauty parlors in a small town squabble with each other.

title: La marquesona
plot: Carmen La Marquesona was a famed flamenco dancer, until a man left her with a daughter. Now she performs with the young girl and a humble troupe. Then a señorito appears who persuades her daughter to leave. Carmen sees her own story.

title: Morgen werde ich verhaftet
plot: The singer Giannina Belloni is found shot. Since she was seen meeting with the concert master Friedrich Burger shortly before her death, both he and his wife are under suspicion. Burger flees and leaves his wife with their child.

title: Mothers of Today
plot: Mothers of Today includes the sole motion picture performance of radio star Esther Field, who was well known on the airwaves of the 1930s as the 'Yiddishe Mama.' The film exemplifies the Yiddish film genre of shund, a brand of popular entertainment which appealed to working-class Jewish-American immigrant audiences with broadly-drawn, sentimental stories that reflected the daily life and culture of a distinctively American Yiddish community. While the shund films were invariably low-budget (and low-brow) affairs, these humble productions formed an important part of life in the United States for their audience. For actresses such as Field or Celia Adler (star of Where is My Child?, also directed by Lynn in 1939), shund offered one of the few opportunities to play strong leading roles. In retrospect, Mothers of Today is an important cultural artifact expressing the anxieties of Jewish immigrant families faced with the younger generation's increasing assimilation into mainstream American society. Shund often dealt with the plight of the Jewish mother, recognizing the important role women played in Jewish family life during the difficult period of immigration. Such is the case with Mothers of Today, in which Field plays a mother coping with her children's troubles resulting from their straying from Jewish tradition. In one subplot, a cantor's son led astray by a woman of "questionable morality" becomes involved with gangsters and ends up stealing the deed to his mother's store. On March 14, 1939, Film Daily reviewed Mothers of Today as follows: "Heavy tragedy, which seems to be an essential basis of all Yiddish dramas, is done to a turn in this new film and it should please the dyed in the wool Yiddish fans. Produced on a small budget with a hurried shooting schedule, the film has considerable merit. Cast members, with the exception of the talented Esther Field, were recruited from the stage for their initial appearance on the screen, and they give Miss Field adequate support. Henry Lynn directs the film feelingly. The story deals with the tragedies which beset Miss Field as her children get in trouble."—National Center for Jewish Film

title: Nav Jeevan
plot: A musical fantasy. Although Mahendra (Shukul), belongs to a clan of proud warriors, he is a hypochondriac. This poses a problem when he woos Menaka (Wadkar) who is fixated on swash-buckling heroics and appears more impressed with Mahendra's rival Jeevan. The 'hero' overcomes his cowardice by taking a magic pill and dreaming that he is his own ancestor, overthrowing a band of robbers (led by Jeevan) and rescuing the damsel (Menaka). The enacted dream, which occupies most of the film's 2nd half, transforms the hero.—Sujit R. Varma

title: Nord-Atlantique
plot: Barnes, the mate of the 'Portland', is the object of the hate of the whole ship's crew. His mistress is murdered shortly before the departure and suspicion naturally falls on him. Some time later, Jeff Cooper, the skipper, falls to his death in the middle of the night. Once again Barnes is suspected and the mate has to resort to force to maintain his authority on board. During the stopover, Barnes is interrogated and finally cleared. He is even appointed captain of the 'Portland' in replacement of Jeff and can marry his best friend's daughter—Guy Bellinger

title: Night in December
plot: In 1919, Pierre Darmont, a handsome, much-loved piano virtuoso, falls in love with Anne Morris, a young woman who shares his tender feelings. But, quite inexplicably, after an unforgettable night, Anne vanishes without trace. Twenty years later, Pierre, at the peak of his glory, has become embittered. Unable to recover his unhappy love affair, he has collected women without ever committing himself to any. Until some night he meets the eyes of a beautiful young lady, who happens to be the spitting image of his great love...—Guy Bellinger

title: Panik
plot: About the conspiracy against the Swedish businessman Ivar Kreuger.

title: The Singing Gate
plot: Simultaneously filmed German language version of Italian film, Casa Lontana. An impresario interferes with a romance between a tenor and a ballet dancer, and must be dealt with if they are to be wed.

title: Forest Fever
plot: The mystical reverence Germans feel for their forests, a theme popularized in Nazi era filmmaking, is dramatized.

title: Alles Schwindel
plot: Peter asks Baron Vermehren, a renowned astrologer, for the hand of his daughter Julia. The baron claims that the stars allow the match only after Peter steals a large sum of money. Honest Peter desperately sets out to commit the crime.

title: Amore di ussaro
plot: On January 1st. 1900 an hussar captain writes three farewell letters to his colonel, his fiancée and to the judge. The letters reach their receivers before he can consummate his plans, and all of them quickly react.

title: Angelika
plot: Once a celebrated opera singer, who sacrificed her career for her husband. Now she strives to become a successful painter. One day, the husband suffers a fatal accident while out horse riding. A short time later, Angelika shoots the art dealer Immerzeel. The court is unable to figure out the facts around the shooting, but assume that Immerzeel was her lover and sentence her to four years imprisonment for manslaughter.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Aus erster Ehe
plot: Barbara rejects womanizer Dr. Deinert and marries Prof. Walter Helmerding who has two children from a first marriage. When Deinert flirts with Walter's teenage daughter Barbara tries to thwart what she perceives as his revenge mission.

title: Beáta és az ördög
plot: Within the walls of the old convent lives Sister Beáta, a young nun with whom Count Martino falls in love at first sight. The Count has an accident and is taken to a nearby convent. Sister Beáta takes care of him, and after a while she is frightened to discover that she is not indifferent to the young man either.

title: Il carnevale di Venezia
plot: Ninetta, a singer who is foreman in a tobacco factory, substitutes her voice at a show by her aspiring chanteuse daughter, so the daughter can please a count she has run off to marry, in this melodrama of maternal self sacrifice.

title: Drei Väter um Anna
plot: A cabaret singer entrusts her illegitimate daughter to a country doctor but doesn't say which of three friends of his is the father. Rumors are spread and relationships are strained until one man admits the truth.

title: En poder de Barba Azul
plot: A young woman from high society, involved in love intrigues, enlists as a cabin boy on the pleasure ship Barba Azul.

title: Gloria del Moncayo
plot: During Agustín's absence, while he is doing his military service in Africa, Gloria, his girlfriend, changes the promise she made to the young man and breaks off a relationship that sustained the illusion of her absent boyfriend.

title: Godvakker-Maren
plot: Two young girls go to the big city to work in a food store. The owner's wife believes she's sick, and the owner is more than interested in the two girls.

title: Gracia y justicia
plot: Don Salvador Miranda, a powerful businessman, is not happy with his wife Maria Dolores. In Seville, a young lawyer and his wife, a beautiful gypsy, meet Maria Dolores who does not hesitate to start divorce proceedings.

title: Krambambuli
plot: It's all about the value of a beautiful thoroughbred hunting dog and his loyalty. The animal has to choose between love and duty. Love, as always, pervails.

title: Liebesschule
plot: A young woman works for two different men, both of whom fall in love with her.In the mornings she is secretary for a popular author and in the afternoons for a singer.Which of them will she settle for?

title: Lillebror och jag
plot: Manager Björkman is going bankrupt and has to take desperate measures to try to sort his life together.

title: Links der Isar - rechts der Spree
plot: When Anni (from Munich) and Alfred (from Berlin) decide to marry her father, true to the latent animosities between the north and south of Germany, blatantly refuses his consent. It's a tough task for both families to make him reconsider.

title: Saint Maria
plot: Nadia, a young Soviet journalist who is passing through Pompeii, discovers the power that comes from the Catholic faith when the painter she loves, Paolo, and who saved her from drowning during the shipwreck of the cruise in which they met, is at the gates of death because of a serious illness whose symptoms are similar to those of leprosy.—jsanchez

title: Peter, Paul und Nanette
plot: Nanette has a boyfriend Peter who works for her jeweler father, and who the father doesn't think much of.Peter uses a fake identity as "Paul" to recover a stolen gem, so maybe now he will make a better impression.

title: La prima donna che passa
plot: At the 17th century French Court, Cardinal Richelieu bets with two courtesans about the possibility that by midnight he succeeds in conquering the first woman who will pass at that time.

title: Room for Two
plot: In Venice, womanising Englishman Vic Oliver takes a strong interest in a married tourist who is played by Frances Day. Oliver disguises himself in drag and gets himself hired as the Days' maid. When Day's philandering husband, played by Basil Radford, shows up, the fun starts.

title: Taverna rossa
plot: Young Susanna one evening comes alone in the "Red Tavern" night club to meet some friends. While waiting, she sits alone and realizes the presence of her father, who would never accept her presence in such a place.

title: Trenck, der Pandur
plot: Film about the fictitious adventures of Franz Freiherr von Trenck, who lived during the times of empress Maria Theresia of Austria garnished with espionage and twisted love affairs.

title: El 13.000
plot: María, an orphaned girl, sells lottery tickets to survive living under a step-mother, hoping to marry her boyfriend Fernando, a mechanic. Her luck changes when she gets a lucky number.

title: András
plot: Petty Officer András Laczkó is mistaken for a nobleman after a tie change at a reception, where an influential man takes a liking to him. His bosses, in order not to offend the guest of honor and to prevent the truth from coming to light, send Laczko to the company's country estate as a ispán. The earth-loving young man from the village soon revives the farm and falls in love with the company secretary, Miss Kató. His success soon leads to trouble with his envious neighbors.

title: Anime in tumulto
plot: A surgeon marries a patient who has become sterile. The woman suffers from his condition and when the doctor's secretary - an abandoned lover - gives birth to a child, the woman kidnaps him.

title: Bünös vagyok!
plot: Klári is already a bride when she realizes that she loves not her fiancé, but the young engineer who is building her house, but she feels she has no strength to cancel the wedding. In his despair, Miklós takes solace in a nightclub, where he meets Lola, who would use any means to win him.

title: Documento Z-3
plot: Italian agents in Yugoslavia during World War II in the last days before the invasion.

title: Hansen og Hansen
plot: The young unknown Hansen stays at a pension, where they await a charmer with the same name. A fire and different circumstances make the police arrest the wrong man.

title: Havasi napsütés
plot: Set among snow-capped peaks, a sanatorium is run by three doctors, Ágnes, Kriszt and Vass. Ágnes is secretly in love with the bohemian Doctor Vass, who is oblivious to her attraction. Apart from them, the most important person is the ski trainer, who teaches downhill skiing during the day and dances in the bar at night. He is now courting one of the patients, the lovely and beautiful Fifi, who is everyone's favorite because she is the owner's daughter. Fifi is incurably ill and he knows it, so Doctor Vass tries to fulfill her wishes and sometimes allows her to dance in the evening. Doctor Christ does not look kindly on his colleague's actions and relations between the two are strained to the breaking point when Doctor Vass withholds one of the patients, Edith, as a free resident because she has run out of money.

title: Kjærlighet og vennskap
plot: Harald's wife Eva has ambitions of becoming a writer, and divorces him to marry one of his friends, Anton. But Anton can't forget his former wife Ragna, and Harald is inheriting a large sum of money. Will this change things?

title: I mariti (Tempesta d'anime)
plot: In Naples in the second half of the nineteenth century, a young noblewoman falls in love with a nobleman of ill repute.

title: M.A.S.
plot: With the outbreak of World War II, some officers and non-commissioned officers of the Navy are called back into service.

title: Menschen im Sturm
plot: Serbia, 1941. Serbia joins the war against Germany and persecutes German speaking residents. Vera helps refugees and the resistance by flirting with and diverting Serbian captain Rakic, but detective Subotic is on her tracks.

title: Oh, diese Männer
plot: Eberhard gets into a brawl with Dr. Spindler not knowing that he just slapped his boss. To avoid the embarrassment Eberhard asks his friend Frank to substitute for him in the meeting with Dr. Spindler. Which accelerates the ensuing chaos.

title: Pimentilla
plot: Gloria, a young dreamer, meets Alvaro, with whom she escapes to conquer the city.

title: Sarasate
plot: Film inspired on the life of Pablo Sarasate

title: Spähtrupp Hallgarten
plot: German soldiers Hannes and Sepp both love Christa, their friendship is strained. Under enemy fire during the Norwegian Campaign Hannes leaves wounded Sepp behind. Feeling guilty he fights even more valiantly when assigned a new deployment.

title: Az utolsó dal
plot: The famous singer János Fehér has lost his voice forever. His secretary, Bokros, and his piano accompanist, Elisabeth, conceal the tragic truth from him. One day, during a car trip, János and his wife come across a miners' party where a young man, Peter, has the same voice as János. Hearing a perfectly similar voice gives John's friends a strange idea.

title: Villa da vendere
plot: When a rich man decides to sell his villa and go to work, his butler hires a couple to pretend the place is a bad buy.

title: Un caballero famoso
plot: When well-bred Rafael meets beautiful but inconstant Eugenia he is fascinated to the point of even becoming a torero to please her wish for fame.

title: Enyém vagy
plot: Mail author for translation: Anna, a divatszalon vezetonoje maganyosan el. Karacsony estejet is egyedul tolti. Seta kozben, a folyoparton eszrevesz egy ongyilkos szandeku ferfit. A hideg hoesesbol meleg otthonaba hivja a ferfit...—Steve Varadi <svaradi@sprynet.com>

title: Geliebte Welt
plot: Blohm, workaholic boss of a big company, marries his secretary Karin who is promptly confined to their home and neglected by her husband. Isolated and unhappy, she decides to divorce him, forcing Blohm to reconsider his way of life.

title: Make Love to Me
plot: A funny classic German picture of the Nazi period, but with no propaganda and with contemporary swing music.

title: Házasság
plot: A busy surgeon forgets his wife Mária's birthday. He does not even attend the dinner in her honor. Mária is offended and, in her desperation, accepts the courting of a pianist. But when he suddenly proposes, she is forced to rethink her relationship with her husband.

title: In due si soffre meglio
plot: When a rich man loses his wealth and is overcome with debts, his daughter scrambles to make a good marriage, creating a love pentangle in the process.

title: Inferno giallo
plot: A Doctor working in the tropics falls in love with another man's wife, but is killed in a native uprising before he can confess his feelings to her.

title: Intriga
plot: In a house where a film is being shot, a corpse appears in the dining room. During the investigation, carried out by a police inspector, who would like to be an actor, and his friend, an actor with detective skills, a servant appears dead.

title: Kvinnan tar befälet
plot: A story about a gang of youngsters living in a boarding house in Stockholm.

title: Mosquita en palacio
plot: Once the Spanish Civil War has ended, the heir of an aristocratic family is missing believed dead. The butler has the idea of presenting his own daughter as the son's fiancee.

title: Muqabala
plot: Madhuri and Rani (Baby Madhuri) are twin sisters whose parents, Seth Dinanath and Radha, are shot in front of them by their mother's rejected suitor Shivnath (Dalpat). The mother dies and the father is kept prisoner by Shivnath who also kidnaps Rani. Madhuri is found wandering by a rich man Rai Bahadur, who takes her home and adopts her. Several years pass and Madhuri (Fearless Nadia) is enjoying her life in luxury. She has a dog called Gunboat who accompanies her everywhere. She finds out about her parents and sees Rani dance at a nightclub. She vows vengeance and soon the sisters along with two friends (Yakub and Agha) fight their way to the gangster and free their father.—Cinephile

title: The Night in Venice
plot: The divorced opera singer Peter (Harald Paulsen) wants to win back his ex-wife Vilma (Lizzi Waldmüller), also an opera singer. He offers her a false engagement for an opera in Venice. He finds a helping hand in the young Annemarie (Heidemarie Hatheyer) a secretary. Annemarie is supposed to distract Vilma's new fiancee Nikolaus (Hans Nielsen) and she really succeeds, cause he is falling in love with her. Peter, now can concentrate on winning back Vilma.—now.voyager

title: La principessa del sogno
plot: A sweet young woman who's an orphan is enamored with fairy tales and fantasizes that she's really a princess to help her through her life in the orphanage.

title: Schottis
plot: In 1850s Madrid the schottis is the new melody. A little boy is abandoned by his drunken father and will live a series of adventures overcoming class differences while a rich lady and a relative search for him.

title: Le signorine della villa accanto
plot: An eccentric professor keeps his eight daughters locked in a villa to shield them away from an outside world he deems corrupt and dangerous.

title: Sucedió en Damasco
plot: Ben-Ibhen, a doctor from Damascus, tries to curry favor with the beautiful Zobeida, whom the Qadi and the Grand Vizier also yearn for. To outwit them all, he summons them to a palace, which is soon attacked by the ferocious bandit Ka-Fur.

title: Szerelmi láz
plot: Opera singer Péter Szendrey discovers that his wife has fallen in love with the opera house's young conductor. Shocked, he loses his voice and continues to work as a clown. His daughter, back from Paris, also takes a fancy to the young conductor.

title: I trecento della Settima
plot: In Albania, a company of Alpini troops defends a mountain pass and occupies a peak overlooking the valley. During the battle, their commanding officer is killed, and his men render him military honors. This is the only Italian wartime propaganda film specifically focused on the Albanian campaign. Shot at the Cinecittà studios, it features real officers and soldiers from the 1st and 2nd Alpini regiments-veterans of the Greco-Albanian front. Despite a commendable effort toward authenticity-down to the use of regional dialects-the film remains inert, decorative, and postcard-like. The non-professional cast comes across as little more than moving figurines, and the pursuit of sobriety is not matched by any genuine expressive power.—Gianfranco Spada

title: Ungdom i bojor
plot: A waitress finds out that her fourteen year old brother is a member of a youth gang doing burglaries in kiosks.

title: La vita torna
plot: Betrayed by a colleague to whom he was sentimentally involved the famous actor Gino Grazioli has long since abandoned the stage. Now he is ready for a comeback and instantly falls in love with a young gifted actress.

title: ¡Qué contenta estoy!
plot: Olvido is a seamstress apprentice who dreams of becoming a singer. She achieves her goal thanks to the help of her friend María del Pilar.

title: Farandole
plot: A ruined banker is abandoned by his mistress. He commits suicide after entrusting a prostitute with twenty-thousand francs. The money changes hands. A crook is arrested in the house of an an actress he had fooled. In a luxury hotel, a typist kills her lover's wife. The trial of the murderer is followed by the bankruptcy of another financier and the money finally returns to the mistress of a suicide in the restaurant in which she had first appeared.—Guy Bellinger

title: Herr Collins äventyr
plot: Filip Collin, the elegant small town patron, has suffered from money market concerns due to bankruptcy on foreign exchanges.

title: Die keusche Sünderin
plot: Xaver heavily protects his only daughter Lenerl because he himself will select her husband. An old sculpture is supposed to watch over her chastity. When a prof claims that the statue is valuable, Xaver has to learn more than one lesson.

title: Man rede mir nicht von Liebe
plot: Painter rookie Pamela plans to work in advertising but established artist Alwin falls for her and urges her to hone her craft. He guides her to fragile success, she detests being dependent on him and tries to succeed on her own.

title: Mi enemigo y yo
plot: Two sisters living with their aunt in a mountain village are fond of a writer whom they have the chance to meet, both of them falling in love with him. When he proposes to one sister, not wanting to hurt the other she is ready to renounce.

title: La niña está loca
plot: In a train accident, Marta is mistaken for the millionaire Alicia. She cannot undo the mistake, as they believe she suffers from amnesia.

title: Noche fantástica
plot: A railway accident causes the passengers to stay for some time at a nearby village. Their individual stories will develop as they wait for the train to continue their journey.

title: Den nye lægen
plot: When a popular doctor, leading the job to get a hospital to town, celebrates his 60th birthday there's a big party. But a new doctor discovers malpractice. But when the doctor is ill with a bad appendix, the tables are turned.

title: Rosas de otoño
plot: A married woman must deal with the fact that his husband flirts with every beautiful woman even when he is growing old.

title: Honour Is Precious
plot: When a wealthy man tries to assault his maid, she fights back and runs away. As she becomes a famous singer, she falls for a young man who takes her to meet his family, only for her to discover a bad surprise.

title: Szováthy Éva
plot: Vienna, 1848. The celebrated belle of the ball is Éva Szováthy, who at this evening finally decides in favor of her love for Doczy Lénard. History and fate, however, put up partitions between the Viennese courtier and the rebel captain. When Lénard leaves Vienna for Nagydóc because of the revolutionary events, Éva, the daughter of the imperial chamberlain, follows him, where she is not welcome. All the more so because the patriotic family had chosen a like-minded noblewoman, Eszter Girálthy, as Lénárd's fiancée.

title: El triunfo del amor
plot: Promising boxer José Luis turns to alcohol, while his girlfriend, Mary Tere, is a successful singer.

title: Turbante blanco
plot: Two men, a doctor and a musician, go to the airport to wait for two women, a nurse and an admirer. They mistakenly pick each other's lady.

title: Service de nuit
plot: A devoted switchboard operator is the village guardian angel.

title: Unge viljer
plot: In the difficult 30'ies, the poor working family Jensen is struggling in affording their sons education, and it ends in tragedy. The son befriends the daughter of the, not liked by the rich employer West, which sends his daughter away.

title: Viviendo al revés
plot: An actress spends a few days at her estate with several friends. For fun, they switch roles: a gangster, who has been picked up, will play the banker; the banker, the gangster; the lady of the house, the maid; and the maid, the lady.

title: En vår i vapen
plot: It's the spring of 1940. Kalle, Gustav and Åke gets drafted to the war and has to leave their loved ones.

title: Wenn der junge Wein blüht
plot: Wilhelm disapproves but his wife Elisa arranges marriages for their daughters resulting in Marna divorcing her unloved husband. Wilhelm's own efforts succeed in easing the way for all three girls finding and marrying their true soul mates.

title: Ópiumkeringö
plot: Five friends, a piano-player, an actor, a critic, a doctor and a banker meet again for a twentieth school anniversary in the countryside mansion of the piano player. But the sudden arrival of an attractive woman upsets their peaceful plans.—Anonymous

title: Ein Blick zurück
plot: Overworked lawyer Eugen is busy mending other people's marriages and business problems. Though he is aware that his wife Valentine plans to leave him for a pianist he can't help it. The crisis escalates when their son falls seriously ill.

title: Das war mein Leben
plot: When young Dr. Ophoven arrives at the village as the new doctor, he is not exactly welcome. His wife Anna helps to break the ice. Their happiness is cut short when she dies. But the doctor is determined to stay and fulfill his obligation.

title: Eine Frau für drei Tage
plot: Lisa's lover has left her. On her train trip to Berlin she meets Hanns who cheers her up, sensing her melancholy. Reluctantly, she agrees to spend three days with him before he has to travel on. Her recent hurt keeps her from trusting him.

title: Garabatos Alady
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Garabatos Claudette Colbert
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Garabatos Freyre de Andrade
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Garabatos Imperio Argentina
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Garabatos José Nieto
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Hassan wa Hassan
plot: Hassan is a driver. He has a cousin called Hassan Bey, who is a crook. They both go to Alexandria, where Hassan the driver falls in love with a girl, thinking she is a maid, and Hassan Bey falls in love with another one, thinking she is a lady. When Hassan Bey finds out she is a maid, he abandons her, and her family tries to assault him....—Anonymous

title: II. magyar kívánsághangverseny
plot: Hungarian Request Concert - it's just what you'll get. The most popular Hungarian entertainers sing, dance, and recite (often political) poems.

title: My Daughter
plot: A poor mother gives up her daughter to a rich family to replace their own dead daughter. But in order to remain close to her beloved child, she decides to work as a servant in the rich household.

title: Kommer du, Elsa?
plot: A young violinist dies during a concert being sick with tuberculosis, and his concert conducting father takes the blame and starts to drink. He is cured, but they find he has an illness ruining his conducting. This leads to a tragedy.

title: Macarena
plot: The loves of a Sevilian girl living in a patio house at Macarena's quarter and his sweetheart Manolo are troubled by her older and generous housekeeper who is also in love with her.

title: Ni tuyo ni mío
plot: Both Celia and Enrique have lost their jobs. They meet in a fair and buy a ticket that wins a house they will have to share. Then they go again in search of a job, and Celia enters the film business.

title: Ogni giorno è domenica
plot: An Italian soldier is wounded on the Greek front and has a leg amputated, but when he returns home his girlfriend still loves him.

title: Quinito y la flauta mágica
plot: Short film from the series 'Quinito'.

title: Quinito, fotógrafo
plot: Short film from the series 'Quinito'.

title: Quinito, futbolista
plot: Short film from the series 'Quinito'.

title: Quinito, náufrago
plot: Short film from the series 'Quinito'.

title: El rey de las finanzas
plot: Several businessmen figure out a system to have fun together, claiming they have meetings with an imaginary banker named Carrasco. When their wives become suspicious and demand to know him they plan a dinner to which he won't be able to attend. Then unexpectedly he shows up.—BSK

title: Tarjeta de visita
plot: During mining works in Africa one engineer helps another and they become friends. Back in Spain the second one will try to return the favor by helping his new friend who has serious marriage problems.

title: Ti gutter og en gjente
plot: Ten boys tries to help a street musician with gathering money for a harmonica. One of the first family films to be made in Norway.

title: Tuvo la culpa Adán
plot: Nora leaves the convent where she has been raised to marry a relative. Just arrived she has an accident resulting in total amnesia. Her identity mistaken a new life begins for her, where she will encounter love, adventure and even crime.

title: Yo no me caso
plot: A very determined young woman enters the home of the writer Alberto Casaseca, famous for his misogyny.

title: Die Zaubergeige
plot: Violinist Andreas plays his cheap fiddle in second-rate orchestras. When a priceless Stradivari is displayed in the museum he gets obsessed, steals it and fascinates his audiences with his art. But the theft didn't go unnoticed.

title: Princess of Dreams
plot: Princess Nour arrives to one of Egypt's hotels. Fruit seller Hamida seeks refuge in the same hotel. Nour and Hamida meet by chance to discover they look identically alike. The Princess asks Hamida to cover for her in meetings and visits.

title: Miss Bossa
plot: Wanting to make sure any suitor who wants to marry his daughter loves her for her character instead of her wealth, Fawzy Pasha claims that he went bankrupt and starts playing piano in the street with his daughter singing along.

title: Eres un caso
plot: Inocencio is to inherit his uncle's department store.So far a serious and well behaved young man, he discovers night life thanks to a friend, causing his fiancée and uncle to worry when gypsies come to celebrate, supposedly at his request.

title: Espronceda
plot: The Spanish poet José de Espronceda (1808-1842) falls in love with Teresa Mancha, whom he will see again in Paris. When he returns to Madrid, his mother tries to get him married with another woman, Bernarda.

title: Garabatos Lepe
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Garabatos Manolete
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Garabatos'.

title: Glück muß man haben
plot: Famous composer Millöcker saves lovesick clerk Ferdinand from killing himself and helps him impress and get close to Henriette, the rich heiress the boy adores. But one day Ferdinand overhears Millöcker confessing his own love to the girl.

title: Ein Herz schlägt für dich
plot: The love of heiress Regina and her husband Martin is put to the test when she learns that he has child from an extramarital affair.

title: Josele en una noche de miedo
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Josele'.

title: El misterioso viajero del Clipper
plot: The wife of a journalist tries to get an interview from a famous businessman.

title: Moderskapets kval och lycka
plot: Eva-Maria Dahl gets the news from a doctor that she's having a baby.

title: Die Nacht der Zwölf
plot: A dozen ladies expect marriage impostor Lanski to keep his promises. But he needs more money and decides to kill Mrs. von Droste who has changed her will in his favor. He covers his tracks but is seen by a neighbor who soon blackmails him.

title: El obstáculo
plot: Enrique, a young man working in Guinea helping missionaries care for highly contagious pest patients, falls finally ill and remembers his past and not precisely exemplary life.

title: Pettersson & Bendels nya affärer
plot: After some time abroad Bendel returns to Sweden and looks up his old friend and partner Pettersson.

title: Se le fue el novio
plot: Two lovers are preparing to spend their holidays in Australia, but they are separated because of a bureaucratic error at the time of boarding. Then, the ministry will force the woman to get another boyfriend to accompany her. For this, they assign her a bureaucrat who takes all the paperwork and who will help her in this difficult task. So, without either of them waiting for it, a beautiful relationship between them will be forged.—jsanchez

title: Der stumme Gast
plot: When construction workers dig up the body of missing merchant Oskar Kampmann in the basement of Matthias Radschek's inn he is charged with murder since Oskar had harassed Matthias' wife Lisa before he disappeared.

title: Black Roses
plot: A young woman is predestined to marry her fathers companion. During the summer she falls in love with an artist. The intended husband detects the love affair and confronts the couple.

title: Los tambores de Fu-Aguarrás
plot: Short animation film based on the film 'Los tambores de Fu-Manchú'.

title: Trötte Teodor
plot: Teodor is happy and newly married to Marianne; unfortunately, his domineering mother-in-law shares the young couple's home.

title: Tutta la città canta
plot: A shy and oppressed professor inherits a musical theater show, so he has the opportunity to change is life and find the real love.

title: Viento de siglos
plot: A man who is wanted by the law and has been a slave dealer looses his ship, and in a harbor's tavern meets three different kind of women who will offer him their love and three different paths in life. A story about good and evil, vengeance and salvation.—BSK

title: ¡Culpable!
plot: After an inmate helps suffocate a mutiny, the prison´s warden decides to investigate the cause of his imprisonment, leading to a revision of the case and a dramatic conclusion.

title: Borrasca de celos
plot: Dr. Pedro Coello is haunted by jealousy and the friendship between his wife, Teresa, and Felipe, a young man from the village. He leaves for America, his ship sinks, and as a result, he temporarily loses his memory.

title: Las inquietudes de Shanti Andía
plot: During his bitter old age, Shanti Andía is gathering the fragments of a diary written at different times of his life. So we know his childhood in the Basque village of Lúzaro, his dreamy youth in Cádiz land, his adventures and misadventures as commander and, above all, the fascination for his uncle Juan de Aguirre, imitation of ancient Basque sailors and true hero whose life adventuress is full of colorful adventures. With the consciousness of a wasted life, Shanti Andía shows an immense nostalgia for the sea that once roamed virile thirst for adventure, always in conflict with mainstream society of men.—jsanchez

title: Macbeth
plot: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

title: La mentira de la gloria
plot: An amateur singer and his friend try to get a chance in Madrid, meeting only disappointments. He and his boarding house artists friends help a poor girl, who in turn will help them stage a show where they all will have their chance at last.—BSK

title: The Unknown Singer
plot: Mahasen and Mohamed and decide to get married in secret after her father opposition. Shafiq frames Mohamed and gets him arrested. Mahasen is forced to give up Mohamed for Shafiq and her father to prove his innocence.

title: El traje de luces
plot: Rafael is a bullfighter who aspires to be hired in Mexico so that, upon his return, he can marry Rocío, his longtime girlfriend. Rafael triumphs in the Mexican bullrings and extends his stay there.

title: La calumniada
plot: Anderson is an American studying Spanish history in Seville. He loves the country. Contrary to Florencio, a painter who despises his homeland and slanders his former fiancée. The two men will settle those matters in a duel.

title: Chittor Vijay
plot: Kind and brave prince living in his kingdom and meets with a sweet girl from his kingdom and together they fell in love and wanted to marry each other- but things get complicated- when an evil king from another kingdom wants the throne and her love and this causes a clash.

title: La fe
plot: Father Luis Lastra is a young and pious priest who does his job in the village of Peñascosa. There he meets Marta, a beautiful parishioner very interested in religious matters. So much so that Marta convinces the priest to accompany her to enter the convent as a nun.—jsanchez

title: Lluvia de hijos
plot: Regina is going through a crisis with her husband. In order not to lose him, she decides to lie to him, assuring him that she is pregnant.

title: Luis Candelas, el ladrón de Madrid
plot: The adventures of Luis Candelas, a real Madrid bandolier who had a double life, centered in this version in his various love affairs.

title: Madunnella
plot: An honest clerk gets into business with a smuggler and commits an embezzlement to pay for his daughter's (Madunnella) wedding. The smuggler has, however, set his eyes on the girl and blackmails her father about the embezzled money. Madunnella succeeds in getting her father's money back even although she has to withstand a sexual assault. Furious with rage the clerk kills the smuggler and is sent to jail. He will be out, however, in time for his daughter wedding with her legitimate boy-friend.—Salvatore Santangelo <pappagone2@libero.it>

title: Malaspina
plot: Maria swears eternal love to Andrea before he leaves for the war. She then takes up with Gaetano a smuggler and becomes a prostitute. When Andrea comes back he kills his rival while Maria understands the evil she did and becomes a nun.

title: La manigua sin dios
plot: A Cachique attacks a Spanish mission in El Chaco, and King Carlos III orders that the religious be expelled from the country.

title: Pokhozhdeniya Nasreddina
plot: The cheerful and cunning sage Khodja Nasereddin, as always, will teach the greedy rich a lesson and protect the poor and disadvantaged.

title: Póker de ases
plot: Adventures of three different men who become friends in the Foreign Legion and will meet again some time after. Then they will know that one of them was hiding his real identity.

title: Crazy Quartet
plot: Elena invites her former husband to his country house, with the aim of winning it back.

title: Quinito, sangre torera
plot: Short animation film from the series 'Quinito'.

title: Lo sciopero dei milioni
plot: A comedy of misunderstandings over soccer pool money.

title: Vår Herre tar semester
plot: Mr. Schwartz and Mr. White looks like ordinary people but are actually supernaturals. Schwartz is emitted by the Devil to spread evil among the people and the White of God to spread goodness.

title: But Not in Vain
plot: The film is set in 1944, in German-occupied Netherlands. There is an ongoing famine. Jan Alting is a a Dutch patriotic farmer, who uses his farm as a place of refuge for Jews, communists, and Dutch resistance members. He has disinherited his son Anton Alting, who is a German collaborator. One day, Anton unexpectedly visits his father's residence and discovers a group of subversives hiding there. He orders his father to kick them out, threatening to shoot them if he refuses. Jan is torn between his patriotic duty and his desire to avoid direct conflict with his estranged son.—Dimos I

title: Fregola
plot: When Pablo, the fiance of show star Fregola, is killed, Dr. Santos is a suspect but escapes. Fregola follows him to Paris to meet and seduce him, get him to confess and have him convicted.

title: El hombre de mundo
plot: Juan welcomes his friend Luis, who has married Clara, into his house during the fairs. After many misunderstandings, he understands that for him happiness lies in marriage.

title: Hoy no pasamos lista
plot: A small-town teacher goes blind and can't teach. Maria will be his guide.

title: María de los Ángeles
plot: Maria de los Angeles, a noble woman, saves a Spanish soldier from death by getting married to him during the Argentine Independence Wars.

title: Morgen ist alles besser
plot: Highschool girl Christiane, an actor wannabe, needs to financially support her hospitalized dad, so sports reporter Thomas lands her a job as a radio performer. Soon radio director Axel and Thomas are both vieing for her attention.

title: Nennella
plot: Alberto Capuano is the natural son of a rich Italo-American and has inherited his money. A gang of mobsters want to cheat him out of the sum through one of the dolls in the mob.

title: El señor Esteve
plot: Barcelona, 1860. Mr. Esteve, owner of a prosperous haberdashery and proud of his son Ramón, attends the christening of his grandson. Twenty years later, Ramón passes away and Mr. Esteve realizes that times have changed and that the family tradition of the haberdashery is at stake.—jsanchez

title: Sin uniforme
plot: Several different people meet in Tangier, where they will have to join efforts to survive.

title: La sombra iluminada
plot: The story revolves around the efforts of a psychopath to wash his name, once he escaped from the clinic where he was admitted for murder

title: El tambor del Bruch
plot: 1808. When Napoléon's Armée crosses the Pirinées to invade Spain, the Catalan people are prompt to resist. With much smaller forces, the legend goes that a drummer boy's strategy would be decisive to win the battle at Montserrat mountains.

title: Und wieder 48
plot: 1948: Students from Berlin University take part as extras in the shooting of a film about the 1848 Revolution. Students form two camps, which fight each other violently about the historical events, commanded by Elsa and Heinz.

title: 39 cartas de amor
plot: Madrid, early twentieth century. Julieta and Alberto are a couple who have been married for several years, but who are still as much in love as the first day. He is the half-orange she always wanted, and their bond of union is growing stronger. One day, Alberto, in the fear of losing her, decides to start writing to his beloved several letters of love under the pseudonym of 'Count of Rocambole'. The intention is to be more relaxed when trying the love and fidelity of Juliet. The problems start when she begins to fall in love little by little with that foreigner who claims to be mad about her.—jsanchez

title: Alas de juventud
plot: Two cadets from the General Air Academy of the Spanish Army, Daniel and Luis, dispute the love of Elena, the Colonel's daughter. Daniel tries to impress the young woman by executing difficult pirouettes on her house, which provoke the ire of the high command. Luis, who feels deep envy towards his friend, challenges him. But while they are in flight, a terrible storm breaks out, so Luis's plane catches fire and he has to parachute. The only chance to survive from him is to be rescued by Daniel.—jsanchez

title: Encounter with Werther
plot: The infatuated young Werther (Horst Caspar) meets in a village at a festivity the beautiful Lotte (Heidemarie Hatheyer) and falls in love with her. But Lotte is already engaged. Werther realizes that his love is hopeless and leaves. When he returns, Lotte is yet married but unhappy. Again their love flames up, which leads to a very deep despair of Werther. Finally he chooses suicide.

title: Derby
plot: "Derby -- The Producer's Cut" is the essential slice-in-time cinema-verite film about the original American family action sport Roller Derby and its stars Charlie O'Connell and Ann Calvello as they dazzle fans across the country with their nonpareil skating and derring-do. The documentary Produced by William Richert, Photographed and directed by Robert Kaylor, follows a common man anti-hero, a young Dayton Ohio factory worker named Mike Snell who dreams about quitting his factory tire job and joining the Roller Derby to save his life and his family. Hailed by the NYTIMES and others as one of the 10 Best Films of the Year, lauded 4 Stars by Roger Ebert, the movie remains the best ever about the sport in the 1970's even as roller Derby Impresario and founder Jerry Seltzer leads the packs of tens of thousands of new skaters rolling world wide. "Amazing," says the CEO Mr. Seltzer. 'ONE OF THE YEARS TEN BEST' Proclaimed the NY Times. "FOUR STARS!" - Roger Ebert -- "DERBY...perhaps tells more about the state of the country today than all the 'Easy Riders' 'Medium Cools' and 'Joes' put together...the film is a kind of guided tour of Middle America -- it doesn't tell whee it's at, it shows where it's at, geographically and spiritually...a riveting piece of cinema-verite America." Oakland Tribune.

title: Despertó su corazón
plot: When an unsympathetic and benefit-driven factory director is shot and sent to hospital, his old and young engineer, a poor but honest man who has fallen in love with the secretary whom the director has proposed to, team up to keep the business running.—BSK

title: Mistress of the Mountains
plot: In the sleepy mountain village of Pianazzo, where the major occupation appears to be smuggling, the people exist in relative peace despite their poverty. It's a "little world" presided over by a parish priest, Don Candido, and a Mayor who is also the town barber. Then a young schoolteacher, a communist, roars into town on her motorbike and shakes things up with her political talk. Gian, one of the young smugglers, is smitten with the newcomer, but he finds he must leave town on account of a conflict that has arisen between the locals and others who want to build a dyke in the area. The teacher, who returns Gian's feelings, pursues him to Milan, where they enjoy some happiness... until she unexpectedly deserts him. This time it is Gian who does the pursuing, back to Pianazzo, where he discovers that his lover is pregnant and has left him "to give him his freedom." Far from desiring such freedom, Gian is delighted with the news of the baby. But his joy will be short-lived: now that he's back in town, his friend Biondino persuades him to make another smuggling run.—Karen Welbourn <welbourn@erols.com>

title: The Remora Part 2
plot: 2 Part account of the 1561 Clan Battle celebrated in Japanese culture. The build up in the first part shows one wagon crew preparing while the lords strategise, before we get to the actual confrontation where the outcome is unclear.

title: Kuckelikaka
plot: Lasse helps grandma in the henhouse

title: Roots in the Soil
plot: A drama of life in a rural community and of a man's love for the land; prepared especially for farm audiences.

title: Rumbo
plot: Rumbo is a nice and splendid young man of gypsy origin who is in Seville with Gabriel, an old friend who was saved from suicide thanks to his intervention, who got rich in Paris thanks to the money Rumbo gave him, to the point of become an important and millionaire banker in London, Buenos Aires and Seville. Shortly after meeting, Gabriel asks him to impersonate him on a journey that he must undertake.—Miguel Ángel Díaz González

title: Vazhkai
plot: Meenakshi, an unwed mother, leaves her baby in Nathan's car after her lover, Moorthy, abandons her. Though Nathan takes care of the child, his girlfriend, Mohana, becomes suspicious of him.

title: La fuente enterrada
plot: A woman returns home from a mental hospital, to find his husband has used her case to write a play.

title: Law of Love
plot: Berlin, 1805: The brave Lieutenant Hofstede fell stormily in love with the charming singer Madeleine. Although Madeleine works in a very dubious establishment and thereby embroiled her lover in a scandal.

title: Historia de dos aldeas
plot: Two emigrants, Pachín and Fuco, who have made it big in Havana, return to Spain. Pachín, suffering from heart disease, dies within sight of land and Fuco takes his remains to the village.

title: The Blue Pearl
plot: Though recognized worldwide almost exclusively for his colorful kaiju fare, director Ishiro Honda (Godzilla, Rodan, Mothra) was a natural humanist with a particular understanding of the relationship between people and their social environs. His debut fiction feature, The Blue Pearl (Aoi Shinju) - virtually unseen in the west until now - depicts the melodramatic, but keenly-observed interplay between a young man from Tokyo and two ama (pearl divers; literally "women of the sea") in a superstitious coastal town. Though raised within the same tradition-bound crucible, the two women - Noe and Riu - are portrayed as diametric opposites; the former meek but affectionate, the latter strong-willed but jaded by a tryst with metropolitan life. Nonetheless, Honda provides equal weight to their desires and their ambitions to break free from the social mold imposed upon them from birth.

title: Doomed
plot: Barbara Florian is in love with Renalto Baldini. After the latter goes off to a distant job to make enough money to marry her, the girl discovers she is going to have a baby. Marco (Otello Toso), posing as a friend, exploits the situation to his own gain, and uses the situation to shock the girl's ailing father to his death. Marco then marries the widow, Valeria (Franca Marzi), the girl's stepmother.—Les Adams <longhorn1939@suddenlink.net>

title: Doubt
plot: A newly remarried widow is accused of having murdered her first husband, who died from arsenical poisoning. Being her present husband a lawyer he takes charge of her defense.

title: Motorkavaljerer
plot: An inventive store assistant becomes a major motorcycle racing star.

title: Niebla y sol
plot: A composer decides to give up work to care for his wife after having written a ballet for the famed bailaores Antonio and Rosario. When an old flame of the wife reappears tragedy develops as well as in the ballet.

title: Trieste mia!
plot: Two Italian soldiers are chased by the Germans and Yugoslav partisans in Trieste after the Italian armistice.

title: O Comissário de Polícia
plot: Ridiculous prejudices of the urban middle bourgeoisie at the end of the 19th century, through the reveries of the Counselor Faustino who, dominated by his wife Maria, gets revenge by having affairs with the maids.

title: La demoiselle et son revenant
plot: Rosette is young and charming but she is crippled so she cannot make the most of her life. Which upsets Jules Petitpas, a single inventor, her eccentric but kind-hearted neighbor. Jules pledges to help her by creating a potion that will cure her. Unfortunately he dies before being able to achieve his aim. But a promise is a promise, and the good man comes back to the land of the living as an ... ectoplasm! And he manages to involve a whole tribe of ghosts to assist him in the noble task of saving the young lady. All is well that ends well.—Guy Bellinger

title: Eram Duzentos Irmãos
plot: A man afflicted by an inferiority complex, is helped out by his comrades to pass the tests to enter the navy. A girl accepts to show a fake love interest in him as part of the plan, and ends up really enamoured.

title: Guilt Is Not Mine
plot: Carlo, a young doctor, occasionally meets Anna, the daughter of professor Valli. Carlo falls in love with Anna, who returns his feelings; but her father longs a brilliant marriage for her.

title: A Treasure on Bird Island
plot: People living on an island finds a treasure, but it does not only do them good.

title: The Skin of the South
plot: The conflict of Ishiro Honda's second narrative feature lies at the crossroads of science, faith, and economic prosperity. When a group of young geologists declares a mountainside marked for residential development unstable, they are met with scorn on two fronts. On one end, they must contend with the local villagers who balk at the prospect of relocation; on the other, they face the ambitions of the headstrong lumber baron, whose actions will only further destabilize the land. Their pleas for reason ignored, the scientists can do little but observe as nature runs its inevitable course. With this film, Honda not only keyed into the theme of man's subservience to his environment which would resonate throughout his career, but also ignited his working relationship with one of Japan's defining cinematic craftsmen, Eiji Tsuburaya.

title: Tragic Return
plot: Marco returns home after eight years of exile by the war and as a prisoner of war to find his beloved married to an other and his own son alienated enough to prefer the substitute father to Marco, whereupon

title: La pattuglia sperduta
plot: The adventures of Lieutenant Airoldi of Piedmont who is trying to gather intelligence for the Republic about the advancing Austrian armies near the river Ticino ahead of the battle of Novara.

title: È caduta una donna
plot: Seduced, impregnated and abandoned by her lover, a single mother marries a doctor. At first things go well, but after a while the doctor begins to resent his wife because of her past. Stunned, she leaves her child with her mother-in-law. Complications ensue.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

title: Cavallina storna
plot: Inspired by Giovanni Pascoli's poem. Ruggero (the father of the poet) is killed by a corrupted officer. His body is brought back home by a mare who, several years later, will reveal with its nitrite the guilty one, giving finally him what he deserve.—Anonima Proiezionisti

title: Cuore di spia
plot: "Spy Heart" - A fisherman is seduced by a young spy who has helped his brother, blind from birth, to get a job as a singer on the radio. But the young man is not satisfied with that relationship and regrets the girlfriend he had. A great emotion returns the sight to the brother and the fisherman, moved and repentant, returns to his ancient love.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: El golfo que vio una estrella
plot: A night watcher (sereno) adopts a child, but the boy grows up being no good. Then the day before King's festivity the seriously sick daughter of his adoptive father visits with her children, who would gladly give away their presents for their mother's improvement.—BSK

title: Interdit de séjour
plot: An outcast everywhere ,particularly in the normal world in which he used to live in , a naive young man tries to find some help in the underworld .

title: Marianne
plot: Marianne and Jojje are in the last grade of a Stockholm high school. Jojje is very fond of his talented, sensitive classmate. His love is not answered. The students come from different environments.

title: Penn
plot: The action revolves around two friends played by Vyjayanthimala and Anjali Devi.

title: En skärgårdsnatt
plot: Different groups of people gather on an island in Stockholm's archipelago for a night of fun.

title: Agora É Que São Elas
plot: Filming of the magazine "Agora É Que São Elas", performed only by women, taken to the scene at Teatro Avenida.

title: Amore e smarrimento
plot: Young "Paolo" is an orphan who falls in love with the charming singer "Marisa". She hope that he will fund her new magazine, but when she discovers he has already spent all his money on her, she rejects him. Desperate, he does something of which he will soon be ashamed.

title: Il barcaiolo di Amalfi
plot: "Antonio" lives a prosperous life with his mistress Cristina. Her family live in a slum where their lives are complicated by young love and jealousy. A letter from a local priest that implicates "Antonio" in the murder of an English nobleman comes to light and soon they must face the King.

title: Café Lunchrasten
plot: A café in the old Klara district in Stockholm attracts an offbeat clientele. Among those who gather at the café is a prisoner on the run, a prostitute, a journalist and a student who is having an affair with the cafe's waitress.

title: Il figlio dell'uomo
plot: A very straightforward chronology of the life of Christ from birth through to the crucifixion and his resurrection.

title: Moana, Virgin of the Amazon
plot: Henri is a music composer, but after a love affair gone wrong, he decides to leave civilization, and isolate himself deep in the valley of the Amazon river.
