Moana is a girl who finds him attractive, and informs him about the tribe's treasure. Eventually, his heart balances between a new love or getting hugely rich.

title: La grande avventura
plot: The adventures of Count Angelo de Marchis as he tries to reach his besieged allies in Rome with much needed funds from England. Can he evade the pursuing "Contessa Sara Mondini" and her Milanese henchmen?

title: La Luciana
plot: A tale of the complicated Neapolitan lives and loves of Maria and Alberto; her smuggling father Don Gennaro and some espionage.

title: Niwatori wa futatabi naku
plot: Three young women make a suicide pact, but they grow to have a better understanding of themselves.

title: These Phantoms
plot: A young husband is persuaded to move his new bride into an old palace that is supposedly haunted.But the so called ghost is really the bride's former lover who is stalking her on the premises.

title: Som i drömmar
plot: In this fantasy, the classic Greek myth of Prometheus is adapted into a modern Swedish setting.

title: Östermans testamente
plot: The fishermen Österman and Sjöberg are sued by merchant Wikström. In order to raise capital, they decide to start producing a medicine from a recipe by Österman's father.

title: Blå himmel
plot: Fridolf Rundquist, who's called the Egg, lives with his family in Möllestad.

title: Brudar och bollar
plot: Two ordinary fellows dream playing the big matches in a football league and try to find a way to make it happen.

title: Cantate con noi
plot: The old friends Nicola and Pasquale meet in the city after many years. The two, now married and with their children, try to marry their four children, but it soon becomes more difficult than expected.

title: Count of Twelve
plot: Two stories - one about a ruthless financier who inadvertently wills his own death, the other about a surgeon who seduces a friend's wife and lives just long enough to regret it.

title: Familia provisional
plot: A German boy, the son of a Nazi officer who had belonged to the S.S., arrives in Spain, where he is picked up by a host family.

title: Ginza no onna
plot: Ikuyo is the boss of Shizumoto, a geisha residence that employs four other women. All of them, simultaneously, reveal the extreme hardships of the profession. From the frustrated search for popularity in the newspapers, through the diffuse desires for motherhood and ending in disappointment in love, the five women survive under the incandescent sky of Ginza, one of the wealthiest neighborhoods in Tokyo. Told from the perspective of a recently hired young geisha apprentice, Women of Ginza is an acidic and lucid portrait of these women who, even in defeat, emerge enlightened.

title: Kati és a vadmacska
plot: A story about a wild cat cub that a little girl raises among her own kittens until it grows up. Then he sets him free in the Zemplén mountains.

title: Millions on the Island
plot: Three children, two brothers and their friend, win a lottery ticket at sports forecasting. Upon deciding not to tell their parents in order to buy a ship, two criminals find out about this and try to steal their money.

title: Na boykom meste
plot: The owner of the inn Vukol Bessudny and his wife Evgenia are evil and greedy people. And their niece, modest Annushka, loves the landowner Milovidov. However, the envious Eugene tries in every possible way to prevent her.

title: Il porto della speranza
plot: The tales of some of the needy who visit the rectory of the kind and benevolent "Don Luigi" and his pernickety sister "Angelica".

title: El puente del diablo
plot: A married couple has economical problems and the wife will incriminate herself blackmailing the murderer of his husband's uncle.

title: Triple Blackmail
plot: A compilation film of 3 episodes of the television series "The Vise" :- (i) "Behind The Mask" (ii) "The Deception" and (iii) "Broken Honeymoon"

title: Alerte aux Canaries
plot: Maxime Bellac owns an art gallery.He has an affair with Michelle.One night when they have dinner together ,Maxime tells Michelle he is forced to leave for the Canaries ,because of paintings.When they take a walk after their meal,a man suddenly appears ,revolver in hand.In self-defense,Maxime kills him and,much to his surprise,recognizes a national security agent.Maxime confesses that he is in the pay of an eastern power :his mission is to get a file concerning Western nuclear weapons.Because of his crime, he cannot carry out his job;for Maxime's love ,Michelle takes his place and becomes a spy.—dbdumonteil

title: Aru yo futatabi
plot: Sida has become an closed and taciturn person since losing his job. On the other hand, his wife Akiko, on the other hand, is playful and energetic. One day Sida learn a secret which his wife hid from him before.

title: When the Mills are Running
plot: The tulip planter Petter Pettersson goes to a competition with one of his most beautiful flowers.

title: Girls Without Rooms
plot: Fransiska is visited by a social worker when she's in the custody. She tells him her lives story, about her mother who was an alcoholic, her father a night watchman and how she and her five year old little sister was left. Her boyfriend was unemployed and needed money and to help him she stole money.—nL {ni_la2000@hotmail.com}

title: Jungle Safari
plot: Jungle Queen (1945), a 13 episode serial, re-edited into feature film format.

title: Den långa julmiddagen
plot: TV drama based on The Long Christmas Dinner by Thornton Wilder.

title: Pasión bajo el sol
plot: After a long absence, Father José, accompanied of another priest, returns to a village in Los Monegros (Spain), which he had abandoned some years ago. A man will help them to repair their damaged car. He is a fugitive: accused of a passionate crime, is pursued by several individuals thirsty for revenge. The priests will intercede in the conflict.—jsanchez

title: Rivalen am Steuer
plot: Manfred Falk is a successful and experienced racer. In a car race in West Germany the South American motorist Eisenacher Alvarez becomes interested in Manfred and wants to hire him. Manuela, the warm-blooded daughter of Alvarez, tempts Manfred with her southern charm to a transition to their team. Manfred leaves his team and his girlfriend Inge to leave for America to win great achievement. As Manfred's new employer him however forbids from business reasons to celebrate his victory, he is very disappointed. Manfred intends to return to Germany after a race at the legendary Monte Carlo.—Robert

title: Castles and Cottages
plot: Lifelong hard work for the count makes the servant Anton a cripple. Everybody calls him Crooked Anton. When, after the end of the war, the land of the count gets divided amongst the farmers, Anton receives a piece and hopes to be able to work freely. But an old debt and intrigue keep Anton and his family from finding peace. The farmers of the village begin to discover their own power when Annegret, Anton's daughter, leaves. Is a new beginning possible for Anton? This film paints an impressive panorama of the development of a minor village in Mecklenburg from the end of the war to the uprising of 17 June 1953.—DEFA Film Library

title: Serenata al vento
plot: A teacher flees his mistress' flat in a hurry because of her husband unexpected comeback and takes refuge in the room of a pupil of his. There he leaves his hat behind and the father of the schoolgirl thinks his daughter has been taken advantage of and wants him to marry her. The man who is in love with her jumps at the idea.—Salvatore Santangelo <pappagone2@libero.it>

title: Sju vackra flickor
plot: A lady orchestra gets a nice engagement in a hotel somewhere in Sweden. The hotel is called the seventh star. And the seventh heaven's hall is where the orchestra shall play. Therefore, the hotel manager want a seven girl orchestra.

title: Syndare i filmparadiset
plot: Set during 1930's Stockholm, a portrayal about the birth of Europa Films - featuring over thirty segments from other movies, including one color scene from Klockorna i Gamla sta'n (1946).

title: El fotogénico
plot: A small-town telegrapher signs up for a singing contest in the hopes of meeting a singing star he is in love with.

title: The Dynamite Brothers
plot: In this Italian attempt to rival Disney's features, 3 brothers have adventures at school, on a deserted island, as concert performers, and in the most acclaimed episode, at carnival time in Venice.

title: Der Kaiser und das Wäschermädel
plot: The pretty and ambitious Franzi Stiglmeier sells outdated fashion at the Springbrunn fashion house. She is engaged to Mr. von Schwan, but is actually in love with the artist Hans Herrlinger - which of course nobody should know. Together with Hans, she succeeds in modernising Springbrunn's range. In doing so, she not only drives Aunt Rosa to despair, but also the whole of Imperial Vienna into turmoil.

title: Lal Batti
plot: This is a film set in a train and on a lonely railway platform where passengers are forced to spend a night at the time of India's Independence.

title: Les lavandières du Portugal
plot: Jean-François and his friend Catherine both work in an advertising agency where a juicy contract with the Floc washing-machine is to be signed. But they quarrel and separate. Catherine joins a competing house while Jean-François goes on working on the Floc file. One day, the young man has a stroke of genius in deciding to tie in the Floc machine with the hit song "Les lavandières du Portugal" (The Washerwomen of Portugal)...—Guy Bellinger

title: Räkna med bråk
plot: A common shoe-shiner inherits a castle. Something his mean relatives dislikes. They try to scare him away with the help of fictional ghosts and other pranks.

title: Said effendi
plot: The story revolves around the teacher "Saeed" who moves from house to house, until he lives in the house of "Ezzat" the shoemaker next door to him and the falsehood of the neighborhood people who harbor bad and pretend love and notices the signs of neglect that fill the neighborhood, and the owner of the house asks "Saeed" to leave the house So, the people of the neighborhood refuse to leave "Saeed" home and leave, and join hands against the owner of the house, so the son of "Saeed" is injured in a quarrel with the children of "Ezzat" and seeks revenge on him.—redahalaasady

title: Spielbank-Affäre
plot: In a casino in a West German health resort, one often sees Sybille - an attractive young student actress. With her winnings from the roulette table, she attempts to finance her studies. Despite a rather lucky streak, her winnings are a little on the lean side. She doesn't, however, gamble with her own money but with that of Dr. Busch, a lawyer, who likes to stay in the background with the argument that gambling houses are not the proper turf for a serious lawyer. From him, Sybille receives only a small share of her winnings later, and only through the intervention of Gerhard Fischer, a journalist, does Sybille come to realize her role in Dr. Busch's fraudulent scheme. Dr. Busch uses her to bring bogus chips in circulation, he wants to ruin the casino and eventually bring it under the control of a monopoly The journalist's attempt to make the deception known proves ultimately to be unsuccessful - the casino bosses have already informed each other and taken the appropriate steps. Nevertheless, Fischer and Sybille become a couple.—Anonymous

title: Sueños de historia
plot: A boy imagines himself as taking part in some historical events. First at the discovery of America, then at the Siege of Zaragoza during the Peninsular War.

title: Bock i örtagård
plot: The wild Jon Esping bet that he will become a churchwarden. He, the upstart and the illiterate who can only write his name, a fox in business, a stud among women and a brute in general, wins the bet.

title: Die Geschichte vom armen Hassan
plot: Hassan lives somewhere in Central Asia in a sparse and dry landscape. While most people in this area have hardly enough water to survive, the rich merchant Machmud is the owner of a grand fountain. When one day Hassan's companion, a parrot, sits down upon the brink of the fountain it is attacked by the merchant's watchdog. In order to save the parrot, Hassan sees no other possibility than to kill the dog. As a punishment, Hassan has to replace the watchdog and sit on the estate tied to a leash. A little while later a horse is stolen. From now on, Hassan has to take over the watchdog's responsibilities as well. Only Fatima, a beautiful slave, brings light and hope in his life. Nevertheless, Hassan endures his punishment because he thinks of it as God-given. When he finally realizes that not God but in fact the rich people make the rules, he starts to rebel. He opens the gates to Machmud's gardens and lets all people drink from the large fountain.

title: Linje sex
plot: In Gothenburg. Louise is out walking at night - and witness an assault. She knows the attackers well. It is her sister Berit with boyfriend Ernie. Louise is told to be quiet of what she has seen. She moves to Stockholm.

title: Ein Mädchen von 16 ½
plot: The young orphan Helga is raised by her aunt after WW II. At the age of sixteen, she turns her back to go her own way. As a rambler, Helga wanders through the night streets of Berlin and has brief acquaintances.

title: Música de ayer
plot: Carlos, Count of San Telmo, likes to sing zarzuela in private parties. Laura, his doorman's daughter, who is in love with him, studies singing and will eventually start a career as a zarzuela singer. Many famed zarzuela arias.

title: Angustia de un secreto
plot: A priest unjustly sentenced to death learns who the murderer is through his daughter's confession.

title: Cristina
plot: Film based on 'Pigmalion'.

title: La dragée haute
plot: An ambitious journalist investigates the murder of a model. Two more crimes will occur, until he manages to unmask the murderer.

title: Duelo en la cañada
plot: In1890 Andalusia, a Cuban singer is torn between an abusive ex-lover and a wholesome new love who is willing to marry her. He doesn't know she is wanted for murder.

title: Enslingen i blåsväder
plot: The lonesome Johannes gets a phone call from Gösta Bernhard who wants to come over to him for a vacation in the archipelago.

title: Mara
plot: During a costume ball, Mara decides to choose the man of her life from among three suitors.

title: Rear Entrance
plot: An older couple, struggling to have children of their own, adopts a young girl.

title: Reportage 57
plot: The young couple Inge and Heinz lives in East Berlin. It is 1957 and she works as a dancer in a bar, while he is a car mechanic in West Berlin. She thinks he should work in the democratic sector before he get into trouble.

title: Resa i toner
plot: Ingeborg Nyberg travels to Italy for singing studies.

title: Adiós, Ninón
plot: The film chronicles the life and career of La Fornarina, a renowned Spanish cabaret singer from the early 20th century.

title: Baishey Shravana
plot: The story set in the late 1930s in a remote village in Bengal, immediately before World War II. It portrays how poverty, famine, unemployment kills humanity.

title: El casco blanco
plot: Pelayo, who lives in a barracks with his wife, is obsessed with the urban guards, in whom he sees a symbol of authority.

title: Gaudí
plot: The life and tragic death of the architect who revolutionized the artistic world with his works, such as La Sagrada Familia in Barcelona.

title: Das Leben beginnt
plot: Erika Schenk and Rolf Gruber live in a small town not far from Berlin and are in the 12th grade of high school. They are happy together, but their love is put under severe strain. Erika's father, a senior doctor in a hospital and former head of a private clinic in Tilsit, is dissatisfied and flees to West Berlin. The daughter decides, with a heavy heart, to go with her father. After the fascination with the new has worn off, her father cannot get a job and joins the army, and Erika is left alone in West Berlin, her mood is at rock bottom. A visit from Rolf does not persuade her to return, as she has fallen in love with her cousin Benno. Rolf gets into trouble because of his trip to West Berlin and leaves school. After a suicide attempt, Erika decides to return to the GDR after all.—DEFA

title: Melodías de hoy
plot: A female singer participating in a festival of modern music hired as a driver a guy who turns out to be another singer who also participates in the same festival. Love affairs, mistakes and a robbery will commit in the same hotel where both were staying.—jsanchez

title: Pirates on the Malonen
plot: Three boys "borrow" a sailboat and sail away for a summer adventure on Lake Mälaren.

title: Schritt für Schritt
plot: The immaculate Rochlitz is upset over his son's urge to serve in the army. His first son was killed at 14 in the Volkssturm. Now Rochlitz is reminded of the Nazi era. Perhaps one must defend peace with arms.

title: Was wäre, wenn...?
plot: When an East German village is relocated fantasy style to the West, the residents become greedy adjusting to a different economic system and worried whether the cooperative farms they have been used to under Socialism will return.

title: Cerca de las estrellas
plot: Barcelona, in the early sixties. On a hot summer Sunday the passions will unleash in the attic where Ricardo and Adela live together with their children, a large working family whose problems and illusions will continue throughout a day.

title: Che femmina!! E... che dollari!
plot: Private eyes are in search of an American millionaire's sole legatee;

title: Labyrint srdce
plot: In 1955 an amnesty for post-war refugees in the West was declared in Czechoslovakia. Many have returned, but lonely Mrs. Kocian Paul is waiting for her son Paul so far in vain.

title: Shaka no shogai
plot: A re-edited, feature length compilation of the two parts of Ôfuji's The Great Sage Shakyamuni Buddha - the culmination of Noburô Ôfuji's monochrome silhouette films. After a portentous dream about a white elephant, the ancient Hindu princess Maya gives birth to a prince. Reared in seclusion from the troubles of the world, Prince Siddhartha is troubled by sights of poverty and deprivation when he is 12 years old. He is married to a beautiful wife, but he is unable to bear the thought of others suffering, and leaves the palace in search of an answer. While sitting beneath a tree, he achieves enlightenment. Planned as a nine-reel life of Buddha, but exhibited in Cannes as 'Part One' with only 6 reels completed, this late work by Noburô Ôfuji was not completed until after his death. It was only in 1961 that it was finally exhibited as a full 72-minute film (comprising 10 reels).—lilyl

title: Steinzeitballade
plot: We encounter seven women who have been bombed-out, suffered miserably, are worried about their loved ones, and are barely hoping or even despairing for a little bit of happiness when they meet up before demolition chief Scharrhahn's handcart, each trying to earn enough to gain a ration card. Marta Breuer, resolute, by no means timid and anxious to gain an advantage; Clarissa Stoltze, her heart full of desire; Mother Knorz who provides the young wastrel Herbert with a new home; the lady Ziska who tends to skive at the expense of others; the young Inge, whom the driver, Strubbel, tries to woo; and the ever-serious and introverted Hermine Säuberlich and Anna Lubitzke, who swap their fat rations for a few cigarettes.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Die Stunde, die du glücklich bist
plot: Vera Berg is a career woman. As a lawyer with her own law firm, she has her life under control, she does not give in to illusions or unnecessary feelings. One day, however, love throws a spanner in the works for her: the married entrepreneur Bönisch, who is notorious as Casanova, tries to win Vera over. At first she's just amused, but Bönisch's sincerely amiable manner makes Vera doubt her previous career-oriented lifestyle.—Filmportal

title: Teresa de Jesús
plot: The life and tribulations of Carmelist nun Teresa de Jesús, who had transcendental experiences. She would write several works and would reform the Carmelist order.

title: Ticket to Paradise
plot: A young woman owns a garden center outside Stockholm. Her two employees, a Swede and an Italian, has private dreams and desires to meet. The Italian plan to take revenge on a fellow countryman.

title: La chacota
plot: A singer seeks to replace her partner. An amateur does it and succeeds on television.

title: Siempre en mi recuerdo
plot: It tells the story of the romantic events surrounding an internationally renowned singer and her potential performance at a charity festival.

title: Take Off Your Clothes and Live
plot: Several attractive girls travel, by various means (plane, vintage car, hitch-hiking), to a nudist camp in the South of France.

title: Trampa mortal
plot: Raúl, an ex-convict, and Clara, a showgirl, form a couple trying to lead a normal life. He has gotten a job and she wants to quit the cabaret. One day, an old boss who wants to disappear proposes to Raúl that he justify his supposed death with an alleged accident. Despite the fact that the bonus would be one hundred thousand pesetas, Raúl refuses to participate in this fraud.—jsanchez

title: Benigno, hermano mío
plot: Film based on the novel 'El baile de Pan'.

title: Cover Girls
plot: A French photographer pairs up with a Swedish mannequin he met during a survey of high life in Rome.

title: Escuadrilla de vuelo
plot: A group of young people enroll in the Villafría school to obtain the title of second lieutenant.

title: Jetzt und in der Stunde meines Todes
plot: The journalist Ella Conradi, who has just fled from Jerusalem and the atrocities raised at the Eichmann trial, is commissioned by her newspaper to report on a "normal" murder trial. The accused, Ralf Jordan, pretends to be innocent.

title: Dream of Happiness
plot: The Karlsson family moves from a small village to a suburb outside Stockholm. The change from a country life to the big city is not easy.

title: Mordvapen till salu
plot: A man witness an automobile accident. He takes care of one of the survivors. They suspect that something was wrong with the car and track it to a dubious salesman.

title: El mujeriego
plot: Juan is a poor book seller, a student of behavior and psychology of Don Juan, who lives obsessed by women, traffics with Playboys with the kiosk and catcalls to all women who pass by, whether accompanied or not. But he is greatly offended when other men praise his girlfriend in front of him. When he wins the pools (even without liking football) a few days before his wedding, he gets drunk on the bachelor party, the same day he learns he has been awarded, and gets angry with his friends for his dishonest advice on marriage.—jsanchez

title: Operación Embajada
plot: A Spanish diplomat named Patricio Arnáiz is ready for anything to get a job as an ambassador abroad. But once he reaches his goal in a small country, Patricio begins to miss the type of life he was carrying in Spain. As soon as he returns to his country he heeds a friend's advice: to create a scandal with a conjugal infidelity.—jsanchez

title: Protest
plot: Ingvar is release from prison and returns to his old life with a steady job and his big love Eva. But there is a rival, Claes, who has caused Ingvar big problems before, and actually even is the cause of why he was doing time.

title: Sie fanden ihren Weg
plot: Helmut works on the construction site and builds high-rise buildings on the outskirts of Hamburg. Monika is a hairdresser that Helmut would like to get to know better.

title: Much Ado About Nothing
plot: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

title: Drömpojken
plot: Ante Nordlund is on his way to Stockholm and gets a ride with a diplomat in his car. He leaves Ante at the entrance of Grand Hôtel where he gets treated like a millionaire.

title: Hütet eure Töchter
plot: Six episodes dealing with different fates of girls and young women. Curiosity of sex, promiscuity, seduced innocence, manipulation, exploitation and invisible parents.

title: Proceso a la conciencia
plot: Eduardo is planning to murder his wife. But he must back down after the arrival at home of a niece.

title: Prohibido soñar
plot: A man who enjoys an enviable economic position has two manias: that Providence warns him through dreams of future events, and incessant jealousy.

title: Tres alcobas
plot: A man tells a friend about a premarital adventure of his new wife and the three travel to clarify everything.

title: The Bloodless Vampire
plot: A killer is at large in the Philippines, leaving a trail of blood drained bodies and eluding police. An American sex crimes expert is called in to help identify the killer.

title: Flygplan saknas
plot: Two pilots must fly together in spite of the strong dislike of each other. At a training mission the aircraft wrecks over open water and they have to save themselves by parachute.

title: Idoli controluce
plot: Having been assigned by his publisher to write a biography of Omar Sivori, the great footballer, Ugo Sanfelice heads for Torino. Given he is not very knowledgeable about soccer, Ugo tries -several times but in vain - to obtain an appointment from Sivori. Forced to fall back upon persons being or having been in contact with the elusive star, he gets to know young forward-center Moretti and soon becomes friendly with him. The young man confides in him and tells him the whole truth about his own "career" : the training in a small provincial team, the promising debut alongside Sivori, the desertion of his fiancée, the premature decline due to a dissolute life. When Sanfelice finally meets Sivori, he finds that the star is no match - humanely at least - for Moretti and he gives up writing the book at all.—Guy Bellinger

title: Juninatt
plot: Britt and Danin meet by chance one evening in Stockholm. During the long, bright night in June they act a half childish, half erotically strongly conscious hide-and-seek game with each other and with their own feelings

title: St. Pauli Herbertstraße
plot: After being raped, a farmer's daughter, rejected by her parents, ends up with pimps and whores in a brothel until an honest car mechanic frees her.

title: Te lo leggo negli occhi
plot: A girl from a country village goes to town and falls in love with a songwriter struggling for success. Soon however their life-paths go different ways and they split. Only for a short time naturally : a song he writes will help them to reunite.—Salvatore Santangelo <pappagone2@libero.it>

title: VariaVision. Unendliche Fahrt - aber begrenzt
plot: A large, darkened, rectangular room. A total of 16 screens hover in rows of four above the viewers' heads, arranged in such a way that each of the 4 rows contains 2 CinemaScope images and 2 standard format color images.

title: Via Veneto
plot: A young man who lives on scams and deceptions manages to convince a wealthy industrialist who has come from the province to finance a film. Having received an adequate advance, he begins to lead an expensive life among beautiful women.

title: La vida nueva de Pedrito de Andía
plot: Pedrito de Andia is an adolescent who is self-conscious about his height. He is in love with his childhood friend Isabel and goes to the port looking forward to welcoming her after her long stay abroad.

title: The Last Saturday
plot: José Luis, a young Barcelona man, dreams of owning a powerful motorcycle but can't afford one. At a race, he meets an Italian team manager who makes advances towards him, hinting he could get the bike if he accommodates her wishes.

title: Bakuto Shichi-nin
plot: Hanjiro, a one eyed vagrant arrives in Okinoshima to save the town from a violent Yakuza group with the help of six handicapped guys.

title: Dessa fantastiska smålänningar med sina finurliga maskiner
plot: Collection of scenes from the six Åsa-Nisse movies: "Åsa-Nisse på hal is", "Åsa-Nisse flyger i luften", "Åsa-Nisse på semester", "Åsa-Nisse på jaktstigen", "Åsa-Nisse ordnar allt", and "Åsa-Nisse i full fart".

title: Mother and Her Eleven Children
plot: Reminiscences of a big peasant family where since 1925, a child comes every other year.The father is called to fight in China.A daughter is allowed to go off as a teacher. The youngest girl writes a prize poem glorifying her mother.

title: Komisari i Dritës
plot: After World War II, more than 85% of the Albanian people were illiterate. Partisan soldier Dritan Shkaba is tasked with opening new schools in north Albania to enlighten the population.

title: Ormen
plot: During his military service a man meets a woman who works in the kitchen at the camp and they start a relationship. When the man is a out on combat exercises, he becomes a witness to his Sergeant being paralyzed by a snake.

title: Schwarzer Markt der Liebe
plot: Harald and Rolf lure young women with newspaper adds promising a lucrative future as dancers. Once the girls get hooked they are drugged to submission.

title: Das Schwert der Nibelungen
plot: The Sword of the Nibelungs (1966). A West German fantasy film released in two parts that is based on the epic poem "the Nibelungenlied".

title: Ska' ru' me' på fest?
plot: Four young people, two men, two women, make a party in an empty floor at Karlaplan in Stockholm.

title: Søskende
plot: A nostalgic reunion arises when three siblings spend some time together in their childhood home where their father is on his dead-bed. A dream of a new fellowship between the three of them is being born.

title: Fast ein Held
plot: Towards the end of World War II, the fictitious French mountain village of Molinette is occupied by German troops. Because of sleep aid, served by his French girlfriend Hélène, the German corporal Karl Küppers misses the departure of his company to Russia. With the help of the purposeful Frenchwoman he becomes Ortskommandant.

title: Biotaxia
plot: María López, a 30 years old married woman, has an old appendectomy scar and another fresh scar produced by cesarean section. María is a character created in a drunken afternoon through the neighborhoods of the port of Barcelona.

title: The Phantom Rider
plot: A heroic gunfighter dressed in a white suit, complete with a full-face mask, cape, and white hat fights villains in the old West.

title: Kärlek 1-1000
plot: Four happy lads fall into a world of luxury. Flashy parties, glamour, evening dresses and cocktail bars. Just like the world of Playboy magazine is depicted in the ads.

title: The Night of the Three Lovers
plot: One Saturday night, Jenny and Vera are sequestered at home by an armed man who wants a big sum of money. As the two girls have no cash, he agrees to wait until they can withdraw the money on Monday morning; then he binds them on the bed and, tired out himself, falls asleep. The next morning, he--Max Sorini by name, a former legionary--tells his story to his two victims: having surprised his wife Nathalie in the company of her lover, he fell upon his rival and in the ensuring fight the lover killed Nathalie and fled. The police, believing that Max had done the manslaughter, arrested him, but he had managed to escape while being transferred to prison. Now he needs money for his defense.—Guy Bellinger

title: The Vicious Circle
plot: A young woman, Maria, is processing her life trauma. She travels head-first to a small village and finds shelter at an inn, inhabited by a dysfunctional family. Marias arrival stirs a lot of emotion...

title: Der Paukenspieler
plot: Five film directors were given the task of making short films based on titles of drawings by Paul Klee.

title: Resan
plot: Together with his younger brother Torbjörn, Thomas got to accompany his father to Copenhagen on the other side of the strait and visit Tivoli and Dyrehavsbakken. It was a day full of sun and joy, but it also came with the news that the father had to leave his pilot position in Malmö and move to Stockholm. His trachea could not withstand the sea air. Thomas thinks back at his father's funeral. He is now coming out of puberty but is still emotionally tied to his father and childhood memories.—SFdb

title: Agent 0,5 och Kvarten - fattaruväl!
plot: The brothers Rolle and Ricky are getting tired of playing Cowboys and Indians. Instead they chase smugglers in the Stockholm archipelago.

title: Till the Happy End
plot: Photo dealer Arnold and his wife Frieda live in harmony and wealth with their ten-year-old son Peter in Bonn, when Arnold's brother Paul and his wife Vera turn up to get his share of the family business. A scuffle leads to Peter falling down a flight of stairs breaking his neck. Although it is clearly an accident, Arnold is prepared ready to pay Vera a sum of money to forget about the rumble.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: I giovani tigri
plot: Five seventeen-year-olds from Milan decide to spend their holidays in the city and end up in a big villa, where a party is held.

title: The Other People
plot: Peter can't get over his ex-girlfriend Elsa even though they broke up over a year ago. He spends all his time on a barge owned by his friend John and John's younger brother Colin.

title: The Initiation
plot: Chuck Johnson arranges erotic orgies in the family guest house while his curious younger sister Tangi peeks through the window. Older brother Kelly returns from a tour in Vietnam to an erotic homecoming planned by Chuck. Tangi finds Kelly in his room shooting up, but she still sees him as a hero. He ends up being arrested while trying to buy heroin.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Komedi i Hägerskog
plot: About emotions and erotic debauchery in a social agency in a small Swedish town.

title: Last of the Long-haired Boys
plot: A World War II pilot is unable to come to terms with civilian life.

title: Love in Our Time
plot: Pseudo-documentary which "examines the British public's most intimate sexual relations and the modern-day permissive society".

title: Four Seasons of the Meiji Period
plot: A puppet film created as part of a project dedicated to the 100th anniversary of the Meiji Village Museum. The story tells of an old man, Taro, who visits Meiji Village and reminisces about his childhood.

title: Mohr und die Raben von London
plot: During his exile in London, Karl Marx awakens a sense of the power of solidarity in proletarian children who have to work 12-hour night shifts in a spinning mill and teaches a rebellious anarchist boy the laws of class struggle.

title: Mon nom est femme
plot: Detailed account of the life of a young woman, neglected by her husband during a professional absence, she involve herself with other male species.

title: Muz na úteku
plot: More than twenty years after the Second World War, a mining engineer named Fischer is revealed as a former member of the Gestapo, Karel Kraus. He is sentenced for murder to eight years in prison and now works with other prisoners on the renovation of the Convent of St Agnes of Bohemia in Prague. Then a car with a foreign registration begins to park regularly close to the construction site. Its crew, a man and a woman, contact the construction foreman, who probably would not reject a bribe offer to perform some service. The prisoner Bicík is appointed to work with Kraus; Bicík gives him a message from Kraus' brother Bert, who lives abroad, that he wants to help him escape.—NFA.cz

title: El paseíllo
plot: Agustín and José María, two young friends who are fans of the bullfighting world, dream of achieving the greatest success and glory as bullfighters. But the vast difference between their personalities, one calculating and selfish, and the other sentimental and generous, causes each of them to follow very different destinies.—jsanchez

title: Villervalle i Söderhavet
plot: Villervalles dad is a nutrition specialist at Unesco, he is sent to some Pacific islands to investigate if there is starvation there. The family insists on coming along on the trip.

title: Roulette d'amour
plot: Alexander, an elderly man wanders through the night. Flashbacks explain how he lost his love.

title: L'indiscret
plot: Jean-Jacques and Kim pose for a photo comics on a transatlantic liner, Le France. The passengers watch with interest. But a filmmaker, François Reichenbach (playing his role), observes and films their reactions, much to their exasperation.

title: Animals United
plot: In this colorful satire, the first German feature-length animated film of the post-war era, the animals of the world want peace on earth. They call a big conference to which representatives of every animal species must attend.

title: No Tears for Ananse
plot: The adventures of Ananse, the spider-man and brother of the god of the sky as well as a symbol of skill and shrewdness and a classic character in traditional Akan legends. The first feature film made in Ghana

title: Prana
plot: A wife for whom the only sense in marriage is having children, risks an affair with a worker in her husband's factory, when the husband is unable to give her a baby, only to learn the worker is also impotent.

title: Quick Constant and Solid Instant
plot: Quick Constant and Solid Instant documents a Flux Mass at Voorhees Chapel at Rutgers University in 1969; intercut with the paintings of John Wallington, and Rod Townley riding around on his big black motorcycle.

title: The Stud Farm
plot: A young man finds his brother being "kept" by homosexuals, and soon follows suit.

title: Urtain, King of the Mountains
plot: This documentary follow the life of champion Boxer José Manuel Ibar Azpiazu "Urtain", featuring reporter interviews and commentary from friends and celebrities.

title: Weiße Haut auf schwarzem Markt
plot: Oli sheikhs from the Orient crave new brothel girls and soon they arrange kidnappings of young women in Hamburg.

title: Cong ming tai tai ben zhang fu
plot: Six husbands decide to have affairs with other women. When they are caught, the wives get even to punish them.

title: Am Ama am Amazonas
plot: Tells the story of a certain Marion, who is involved with three men at the same time and, when she becomes pregnant, wants to attach the child to them all, whereupon friend no. 1 loses the sense of smell, friend no. 2 falls into a hydrogenation tank, and friend no. 3 of one Amazon expedition no longer returns.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: The Adult Workshop of Love
plot: For the first time a motion picture reveals the secrets of how a woman can enjoy maximum sensual pleasures. Discover Orgonomy, the concept of complete sexual fulfillment, if you want something strange and miraculous to happen to you.

title: Los extremeños se tocan
plot: A turk millionaire and eccentric believes in the parallelism (there's a person wherever that born the same day and the same hour) and he encounter that person in Spain.

title: I Told You So
plot: This comedy tells the story about a father who refuses to agree to his daughter's marriage to a wealthy man. The story chronicles the conflict between a family in post-colonial Ghana as they struggle to choose between love and money.

title: Jaider, der einsame Jäger
plot: When Jaider has to illegally poach in order to feed the citizens of a poor Alpine town, he gets into a blood-soaked conflict with the German authorities.

title: La larga agonía de los peces fuera del agua
plot: The singer-songwriter Joan Manuel Serrat plays the role of a young fisherman named Joan from Ibiza (Spain) who falls hopelessly in love about a beautiful English tourist and it leaves everything to follow her to London, where he is introduced to the hippie world.—jsanchez

title: Liberxina 90
plot: Romy, a beautiful red-haired woman, meets Luis and his group of revolutionary activists, who try to change the system with a gaseous substance called "Liberxina", so that the masses could think for themselves and not be manipulated by the repressive political authorities.—jsanchez

title: Love Without End
plot: A successful businessman who fell in love with a night club singer.

title: My Father, the Ape and I
plot: The monkey researcher Dr. Felix has made it his mission to publish a "monkey-German" dictionary. His subject of study and constant companion is Jimmy, a chimpanzee who loves drinking.

title: Metamorfosis
plot: A group of scientists transform a type of strange animal into a very beautiful woman programmed to behave in silence. The conditioning that the consumer society imposes on the individual, the slavery of bodies and spirits, and the ruthless lack of sensitivity of humans are condensed in this film shot in natural scenarios.—jsanchez

title: De många sängarna
plot: Jeanette is an inmate at a juvenile prison. She contemplates her life which has been miserable ever since birth.

title: Der rote Reiter
plot: In 1920, the 16-year-old working boy Michael from Erzgebirge made his way to Russia. He wanted to become a Red Knight of the Budjonny to fight for the interests of the working class in the land of the socialist revolution.

title: Stockholmssommar
plot: About the photographer Jan and his reflections on life and portrays his relationship with the suicidal dancer Lena.

title: Tintomara
plot: In March 1792 the Swedish King Gustav III is murdered at a masked ball. Five young people are involved in the murder story, including Tintomara, a 17-year-old inter-sex who dominates over the others.

title: Cake in the Sky
plot: A mysterious and colossal flying cake appears in the sky on the outskirts of Rome: a group of children of inhabitants of the township approaches it and, gluttonous as children are, takes away pieces of chocolate and other fragments. The appearance of the bizarre flying object puts civilian and military authorities on the living and even raises the concern of an avid candy tycoon, who fears UFO competition. After attempting to scare the population with the false news that the cake is poisoned, it is denied on live television by the children, who flee the control of the authorities and reach the cake again, reappeared and landed on the top of Monte Chicco.

title: Hot Circuit
plot: An exploitive fate has it that a stripper is led to a salesmen, led to a babysitter, led to an adventuress, led to a woodcutter, led to a "nymph", led to a producer, led to "his Girl Friday", led to a hustler, led to the stripper.

title: Fresh, Young and Sexy
plot: Seven vignettes explore the way in which modern woman have learned to take charge of their sexual needs.

title: Sin fin
plot: Punctures the myths sustaining modern publicity and advertising methods.

title: St. Pauli Nachrichten: Thema Nr. 1
plot: A television reporter reports in an episode film about the magazine "St. Pauli News ".

title: The Story of F
plot: Participants perform various sexual acts depicted by classical art works

title: Tokoloshe
plot: A young African boy is rescued from a witchdoctor's death curse. He travels to the big city where a blind white man becomes his protector.

title: Wenn die Jungfrau mit dem Stier
plot: Sexuality education with astrologer Wolfgang Döbereiner who wants to prove how much the love life of man will be influenced by his date of birth. The questionable hypotheses of the film are illustrated by film examples of dismaying primitiveness.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: An Act of Confession
plot: Girl about to become a nun has recurring sexual dreams.

title: A City's Child
plot: To escape her demanding, sick mother and her suburban loneliness, a middle-aged woman slides into a fantasy world in which there is incredible relief.

title: The Lonely Heart
plot: Antoñito is a bachelor who works in a cabaret as a clarinetist. He has put an advertisement in the newspaper, looking for a good and honest girl, and to which responds Rocío, who escapes from her native Córdoba to hide the embarrassment of her pregnancy. The coexistence with the naive clarinetist, who refuses the insinuations of a co-worker dedicated to prostitution, who idolizes his deceased mother and keeps as a relic the orthopedic leg of his late father, is not easy. The other men will tend their ties around Rocío, that makes way in the world of the spectacle pretending to be blind. When she can no longer conceal that she is pregnant, Antoñito decides to give his name to the fruit of sin.—jsanchez

title: Un día de noviembre
plot: the story of a young man named totally devoted to the Revolution. When he is diagnosed with a cerebral aneurism, he takes stock of his life as a revolutionary and reconsiders his relationships with his family and friends

title: The Elevator
plot: The occupants of a stalled elevator soon tire of waiting for rescue and begin to reminisce about various sexual escapades.

title: The Incredible Body Snatchers
plot: Drifters rape mother and virgin daughter.

title: El love feroz o Cuando los hijos juegan al amor
plot: Vicente and Margarita are a traditional and middle class married couple whose life is surrounded by a sea of confusion and uncertainty when their children begin to make their own decisions. They have discovered love and will not let their parents tell them what to do or who they have to love. The principles and traditions of the family will be replaced by each of the young people who will represent the different social problems of the time. Thus, the coexistence between them will change without Vicente and Marga can do anything to avoid it.—jsanchez

title: Meine Tochter - Deine Tochter
plot: A college teacher anxious to become headmaster obliges his school's caretaker by officially figuring as the father of the caretaker's daughter who is on a visit from America. This impersonation gives rise to a number of comic involvements.

title: I figli chiedono perché
plot: In a small town in Palestine, a Jewish woman attends an Arab boy. The two fall in love and manage to get married. At the outbreak of the war her parents decide to save the whole family.

title: Honeymoon
plot: "Honeymoon" - Carl meets Inger through a personal ad. They fall in love, move together, but realize that they are very different. Nevertheless, they decide to marry. On their way home from the wedding, they fall through a hole in the street and into the sewer system, where they are forced to spend their honeymoon.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: De antikrist
plot: To hasten the return of Christ, the world is transformed into a den of iniquity, a modern Sodom and Gomorrah. On the grounds of the psychiatric institution called 'Hoop doet leven' ('Hope brings life').

title: Black Harvest
plot: Set in a coal mining community in the Appalachian Mountains of Kentucky.

title: The Birth of a Nation
plot: Authentically 'New' German Cinema, and, simultaneously, an archaeology of narrative film itself, Wyborny's avant-garde landmark defines cinema as a 'nation' that has perversely acquired rulers, laws and hierarchies.

title: Jakou barvu má láska
plot: Cyril Dadák (Václav Postránecký), a TV reporter falls in love at first sight with a young engineer Milena (Jaroslava Obermaierová) while he makes a reportage in a chemical factory. Milena has been dating for several years with a test driver Pavel (Rudolf Jelínek), however when she meets Cyril she feels that he might be the Mr Right. She accepts Cyril's invitation for a date and she spends a night with him. In the morning she finds in her flat Pavel. She wants to explain to him everything but Pavel makes coffee with a smile and gives her back the keys from the flat.—NFA.cz

title: Laughter in the Rosary!
plot: Two schoolgirls act as society ladies, evoking an atmosphere of the roaring twenties. A transvestite tries to read while spaghetti descends on his head.

title: El mundo de Pau Casals
plot: The great Catalonian cellist tells of his life and work, and of his long exile between the year of the Franco takeover (1939) and the the death of that Fascist dictator (1976).

title: Mädchen, die nach Liebe schreien
plot: Photographer Fred falls in love with the nymphomaniac model Christa. But also his assistant Olga has kept an eye on him. Soon he has to decide between the two women.

title: Om 7 flickor
plot: The film portrays one day in an home for adolescent care on the Swedish countryside, where the faith of seven girls have been drawn together.

title: Pan
plot: Documentary about Pan using comic strips, it portrays Pan as an innocent, peace-loving person, at ease with man's natural background.

title: The Rainbow Boys
plot: Three bickering people search after the gold mine the father of one of them owned.

title: An Evening with Chris Jangaard
plot: A black and white documentary in which the director conducts a late-night outdoor interview with a European mod about his life, his imminent deportation from the United States, and his experiences during the decline and fall of 1960s Britain. This scene is intercut at random intervals with vintage Beatles footage.—Anonymous

title: The First Paintings
plot: Two college students spend the weekend together at one of their homes. The parents, though welcoming, can't prevent their own bitterness and disillusionment from taking center stage. Both young men are forever changed by the experience.

title: Un hombre como los demás
plot: Marisa, engaged to a doctor who seems to be a great catch, loses her head over David, the young priest who is presiding over her cousin's wedding. She decides to conquer him with all her weapons.

title: Laocoon & Sons
plot: Inspired by Virginia Woolf's Orlando, magic transformations give rise to multiple and eccentric character roles for the same extraordinary woman.

title: Maracaibo Petroleum Company
plot: Melina y Segundo contraen matrimonio en una ceremonia colectiva que forma parte de la campaña electoral del candidato del Partido del Pueblo. Segundo comienza a trabajar en la Maracaibo Petroleum Company. Pronto se ve involucrado en la misteriosa desaparición del cura del pueblo, quien participa en el tráfico de armas en apoyo a la guerrilla. Segundo es encarcelado y Melina cae víctima del abuso de su jefe. A partir de este momento, ambos participan en el contrabando y la prostitución como la solución más fácil para sobrevivir

title: Napraforgó
plot: Mail author for translation. "Elni annyit tesz, mint mindig, mindig ismerkedni. Ha tul sokat vagyunk egyedul, elszokunk a vilagtol." Mas a videk nyugalma, mas a varos zaja. Evelin csendes maganyban el foldbirtokan. Az elet fatyolos kozelsegeben erinti meg, a szerelem hamar jon, s eszrevetlen tavozik az ajton. Almos, koborlo lovagja az ifjusag elmulasat fajlalja. Pesti baratnoje nagyvilagi no, aki nem akar es nem tud regenyek szerint elni. Kitarto foldbirtokos kerojet osi nemesi cimeert, szokasaiert gunyolja. De o is keres valamit: az orult szenvedelyt, a nevesincs ferfit. Az elet egy hosszadalmas oszi utazas. Mindig csak eszak fele.—Steve Varadi <svaradi@sprynet.com>

title: Skärseld
plot: An established writer goes to the Nobel Banquet. He is a family man. In the background another woman. A suicide attempt. His work is rejected by the publisher.

title: Walanda
plot: A young village girl marries a wealthy city man, but their differences make the marriage difficult.

title: Autumn Fires
plot: Actor Martyn Sanderson returns in 1977 to the Hokianga of his youth and visits his elderly and romantic aunt, Olive Bracey. Her reminiscences of pioneer life mesh with nostalgic songs and readings from her fiction.

title: Les deux gouines
plot: A prominent Parisian lawyer, at the dawn of a political career, is welcomed by an old friend and her wife and daughter during a journey in the provinces.

title: Erotic Fantasies special edition
plot: This is not actually a film with a plot but rather a made for video compilation of hard core lesbian scenes put together by some unknown production company to capitalize on the fame of some "Adult Actresses". It should not be listed in Brigitte Maier's filmography since her scenes are are clipped from "Poor i skandalskolan" (Sweden), a/k/a "The Second Coming of Eva" (US Title) and likely done without her knowledge.—<flimbuff@aol.com>

title: The Farmer's Daughters
plot: After the farmer's insatiable daughters gang-rape their farmhand Fred, three escaped convicts arrive and have their way with members of the family. Fred surprises the convicts, then determinedly replaces them in victimizing the predatory family.—MG

title: Fem dagar i Falköping
plot: Sofia has lived in the small town Falköping during her childhood. Since she left her hometown she has become an famous international actress. Now she longs to return to the playgrounds of her childhood, and meet old friends.

title: Honey Pie
plot: A columnist at a magazine begins to read some of the letters she gets from her readers, and some of them are very erotic in nature--so much so that she begins to fantasize about the people and situations she's reading about.

title: J.B.1
plot: Part fiction/ part documentary study about the making of a porn film.

title: The Game of Solitaire
plot: The life of Julien Vogel, a psychiatrist, is turned upside down by the death of a teenager he had under treatment. To stand back a bit from things, he decides to take a vacation in the company of his son Matthieu. But why does he choose to go to a lost hamlet where only three houses are still inhabited? When his son gets killed, Julien loses all his bearings and ends up taking up the blame for murdering him, a crime he did not commit, seeking refuge in death.—Guy Bellinger

title: Looping
plot: The thirty year old bee is a daredevil, everything seems to work for him. But suddenly a tragic event tears him out of his carelessness. In the explosion of a carbide furnace in operation, a colleague is killed.

title: Man Against Man
plot: Robert and Michael meet on their return from captivity. They discover that they are both married to the same woman: After Robert was pronounced dead, Michael married Anna. The decision about the future is left to chance.

title: Maria
plot: Maria and Leif has a relationship. Leif is a former bank robber. He makes another hit and is sentenced to prison. He urges Maria to forget him.

title: Mi adúltero esposo ('In Situ')
plot: Serafín has decided to pursue a private investigation. His client is Doña Tecla, who suspects that her husband, Juan, is unfaithful to her and wants him to be caught in flagrant adultery.

title: Monika und die Sechzehnjährigen
plot: Monika and the sixteen year olds.

title: Må vårt hus förskonas från tigrar
plot: Director Torbjörn Axelman and singer Lee Hazlewood philosophize about their lives. In their vicinity are the psychics Fedra, mysteriously talking about tigers, the forces of evil that constantly threaten.

title: La planque 1
plot: Bénazéraf explores hard eroticism in this violent, dark, and surreal crime thriller.

title: La planque 2
plot: Bénazéraf explores hard eroticism in this quirky, light, and comedic crime story.

title: El precio del aborto
plot: Lynn lives with her husband Arturo on an island off the coast of Spain. Everything looks normal except for the fact that Arturo suffers from a disease that makes him sexually impotent. Frustrated, Lyn has an affair with a local youth, and she soon discovers that she is pregnant. She needs to get rid of the baby very quickly so that Arturo doesn't know she's cheating on him, but abortion being illegal, she doesn't know where to go. There is this old local woman who aborts young women, but the risk taken on life is big, as hygiene conditions are very low. There is also this strange doctor, a friend of Arturo, but he'll agree to do the operation only if Lynn has sex with him...—anonymous

title: Puss*O*Rama
plot: There is no plot. This is simply a compilation of Porn Scenes from features made by performers who were well known in that field at the time.

title: Diary
plot: Eduard and his wife Charlotte are happily married, decide to move out of their tiny apartment into a space in an abandoned factory building, which they can fix up to their liking.

title: Ti-Cul Tougas, ou, Le bout de la vie
plot: A Montreal musician, Rémi, who robbed his marching band on tour in Charlottetown, gets away to the Magdalen Islands with his girlfriend and gets shelter to a friend who his mourning her husband in a coma. He dreams of going away to California, but a colleague, Martin, reaches him - And trouble lays ahead unless Rémi changes plans on the way, otherwise Martin can call the police and the marching band.—Realliveclaude

title: Tüzgömbök
plot: Mail <svaradi@sprynet.com> for translation. Thali Ambrust gyermekfejjel eri a II. vilaghaboru. Szulei videkre kuldik, hogy minel messzebb keruljon az ostromra varo fovarostol. A haz, ahol edesanyja es huga elt, talalatot kapott - mindketten meghaltak. A kisfiut az edesapja a nyugati hatarszelre viszi abban a hitben, hogy ott nagyobb biztonsagban lesz. Ambrus elet es jatek, alom es valosag hataran lebegve eri meg a haboru veget.—Steve Varadi <svaradi@sprynet.com>

title: Ungkarlshotellet
plot: A divorced and lush of a man is working part-time in the Port, staying at a bachelor hotel in Stockholm. One day he decides to shape up and change his way of life.

title: The Randy Widow
plot: Infidelity at a country chateau leads to deadly consequences.

title: Yo creo que...
plot: It is the story of a man and a woman, and a film shoot. A different, independent and avant-garde bet, explaining the very structure of the filmic language, for a Spanish society that was just beginning to wake up after forty years of dictatorship.—jsanchez

title: The Affairs of Janice
plot: Husband plots to kill his wife & her lover.

title: The Titbit
plot: Young Gigi, a teenager, is enjoying Summer vacation with uncle Amedeo and his wife. He seduces his cousin, Gemma and a his English teacher, Betsy, a blond girl.

title: Call Me Angel, Sir
plot: Evil aunt abuses orphan girl.

title: Fango
plot: Marión is married to Juan, a morbid novelist who introduces her to a circle of dangerous friends, fond of orgies. After an accident, Juan is disabled in a wheelchair and pushes her to lead a dissipated life.

title: Attempted Flight
plot: A homesick 10-year old Yugoslav immigrant escapes from Germany on foot in a bid to return to his homeland.

title: The House of Bernarda Alba
plot: A domineering, reclusive and ostentatiously pious widow in a small Spanish town keeps such close watch on her daughters that they are unable to have normal social lives. However, the eldest is allowed to become engaged to an unprincipled young man, primarily for the financial advantages it will bring the mother, Bernarda. Jealousy and envy ensues among the other daughters.—Albert Sanchez Moreno <a.moreno@mindspring.com>

title: Iconockaut
plot: Two lovers, a man and a woman, meet and separate in a timeless space.

title: Swift Shaolin Boxer
plot: Angela Mao rips through her enemies! Fierce females Angela Mao and Judy Lee search and seize the Five Phoenix's Night-Shing Pearl from the wicked bandits of the Black Wind Fortress. Tieh Ying-Hung, as the leader of the woman's gang, vows to overthrow the fortress in order to restore law and order. Can she conquer the fortress and its massive army of kung fu masters and death defying traps?

title: Exquisite Pleasure
plot: Martine, Mimi and Doris have had enough of providing for their slacker boyfriends. They decide to rent a place of their own, as well as a manservant. Soon, their newfound decadent lifestyles causes them to lose their respective jobs, and the manservant flees because of sexual harassment. Therefore the girls decide to start a private brothel.—Il Tesoro

title: Kristina Talking Pictures
plot: Kristina, a self-named Hungarian female lion tamer, arrives in New York to become a dance choreographer. Kristina, now a middle-class NYC artist concerned about the environment, has a sailor lover named Raoul. The film, a collage work, an essay film, a fictional narrative and a documentary all rolled into one, is one of the most important independent American feminists films made during the 1970's.—thustlebird

title: Langsamer Sommer
plot: Shot on a Super-8 film, John Cook's self-reflective film chronicles the summer of 4 people spent in Vienna in which he plays his alter-ego

title: Lies
plot: This controversial film depicts the S&M relationship between a middle-aged sculptor and an 18-year-old high school student. Based on a book by banned author Jang Jung-il, the film was officially screened at the Venice Film Festival.

title: Más fina que las gallinas
plot: Alicia is a young woman who practices prostitution in Madrid in order to save money to open her own boutique. Lorenzo, a childhood boyfriend in the village and a former priest, suddenly shows up at Alicia's flat. There he will meet Enrique, a mature businessman who aspires to marry her. The problem is that Lorenzo is so naive that he is still in love with Alicia.—jsanchez

title: Les plaisirs fous
plot: Gérard's new secretary, Caroline, is at first cool and distant, but the horny Gérard soon changes her attitude.

title: The Mistress
plot: Manuela Silva is an attractive Andalusian young woman who left her village ready to succeed as a singer in Madrid. By chance, she meets Eduardo, a neighboring composer who gives Manuela her first opportunity in the world of entertainment, and between them is born a romance. But, little by little, as Manuela gets successes she will meet other men, richer and more powerful than Eduardo, who will end up turning her into a luxury mistress.—jsanchez

title: Soviel Lieder, soviel Worte
plot: At the World Festival 1973 in Berlin, Alexej from Moscow meet Mascha who performs with an ensemble. Hans also like Mascha and when he thinks he sees her at an event. They go dancing. But it is not Mascha, but her lookalike Maria.

title: Teenage Dessert
plot: High school girl cruises Venice Beach on roller skates, looking for sexy adventures.

title: Toestanden
plot: The improvisation-based performance was inspired by psychiatrists such as RD Laing (Family and Madness) and J. Foudraine (Who is of wood). The Werkteater played this performance 'in the den of the lion': in psychiatric institutions for patients and carers. This led to very intensive and adventurous performances in which 'a lot' always happened. Afterwards the discussions sometimes ran high, but even during the performance the audience sometimes mixed themselves in the scenes.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Between Women and Wives
plot: Depicts various relationships between four beautiful sisters, their husbands, and their second daughter's husband's mistress.

title: Vibrations Sexuelles
plot: Alban has lost the lust for love. A female psychiatrist helps him to find the meaning of life and sex once more.

title: Agni Nakshatram
plot: Agninakshathram is a 1977 Indian Malayalam film, directed by A. Vincent and produced by MO Joseph.

title: White Flowers for the Dead
plot: Dr. Sarath domineers over his timid wife Vineetha. She dies during his surgery and Sarath is forced to live with the specter of his wife hanging over him.

title: Bisi, Daughter of the River
plot: Bisi, born in Badagry, rejects father's demand to become priestess. Moves to Lagos, works as secretary for Paul Banji. Falls in love with Banji's partner Dexter Raymond, distancing herself from Badagry.

title: Body Love
plot: On the day of her 18th birthday, Martine is instructed by her father that she will be deflowered at an orgy later that day.

title: Candi Girl
plot: Ben and Larry are two used car salesmen, who like to fool around with their sexy sale assistants. When the mob shakes them down for protection money, sexy Candi intervenes.

title: Strawberry, Lemon and Mint
plot: A saleswoman gets involved in a meaningless conversation between a military man and a film director.

title: Dirty Lily
plot: After losing her job and being disowned by her mother, Lilly sets out to find her father in New York City, and she finds plenty of sex along the way.

title: La perversion d'une jeune mariée
plot: On the eve of Marie-Christine's marriage to Frederique, the groom is presented with four stories of sexual encounters out of the past of his wife to be.

title: Genesis Chapter X
plot: A Ghanaian surgeon in London, returns to his homeland to seek out his mother. She is living with another man after the death of her husband. She does not realise that it is her son who has come to their shack seeking shelter for the night and the elderly couple plan to murder him, taking him for a wealthy young man. She receives a shock when the young man reveals that he knows about the circumstances leading to his father's death - murder by his mother's lover.—BFI Archives

title: Les grandes jouisseuses
plot: Pierre has sexual fantasies about his next door neighbor Marianne leading his wife to get him an appointment with a sex therapist.

title: In memoriam
plot: After spending several years in England, the writer Luis Bosch returns to Spain in search of Paulina, a woman whose love he once scorned for being too focused on his career and himself. In the course of his search, Bosch will discover that Paulina gave herself to another man out of desperation, dying a short time later.—jsanchez

title: Inside Jennifer Welles
plot: Jennifer Welles gives fans the treat of their lives - practical demonstrations in the art of seduction as she tells her story with humor, wit, sex and the joy of loving.

title: Night Fever
plot: A respectable married couple, Lise and Bertrand, feel the need to cheat. Much to their surprise, they reunite in the same house of pleasure they frequent. They are both in for a new sexually-liberated married life after horny debauchery.

title: Illusions Within Young Girls
plot: A pretty but shy and lonely secretary fantasizes about having sex with everybody she meets.

title: Jouir jusqu'au délire
plot: A group of adventurous ladies aim to hold a dinner party at a country villa culminating in an orgy so after several sexual encounters with various partners/threesomes they ultimately achieve their goal of group sex.

title: Joy
plot: A young woman, Joy, refuses to have sex with her boyfriend. But after being raped, she becomes obsessed with sex and starts having intercourse indiscriminately. She is arrested by the police but is released after having been "very" cooperative.—Mattias Thuresson

title: Juventud drogada
plot: A rich young man, Albert, gets involved with sexually loose women and shady drug dealers.

title: Lloksy Kaymata
plot: A rural community in the Ecuadorian Andes suddenly faces a land dispute with the legal representatives of a large company. The discovery of very rich ore deposits in the territory is the reason of the offensive greedy on those places, where the community lived since immemorial times.

title: The Mad Monk
plot: Consists of four stories that see the roaming monk save a mother and daughter from the brink of death and a young man from the hands of unscrupulous debtors. Ji Gong also deals mischievous justice on robbers and corrupt officials.

title: Mondays with Fanny
plot: Robert works at a warehouse and as a cinema usher and lives in a strained marriage. Every monday, he visits his ill father at the hospital. There he meets the orderly Fanny.

title: Double Suicide at Nishijin
plot: "Double Suicide" - Yumi, an exceptionally beautiful call girl, has a close call with death when a client forces her to die with him. An old cop pities her and agrees to be her guarantor so that she could join a Nishijin weaver workshop. Yumi wishes to put her dark past behind her, but she's exposed by an ex-client. Despite the unwavered support of the old cop, she sees no way out and uses her seductive body again to get what she wants. Hiroyuki, her co-worker at the weaver workshop, is a pure-hearted young man who may redeem Yumi from her deadly path as a femme fatale.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Olivia
plot: The setbacks of a young girl from the provinces in Port-au-Prince.

title: Pasiáns
plot: Student Eva (Jana Bousková) is dashing up a steep slope to try to catch a bus, but she twists her ankle and the bus doesn't wait. There won't be another bus until the next day, and so Eva returns to her parents' cottage where she has been studying by herself for several days. She finds the door open, and inside a young man, Dusan (Jan Hrusínský), who behaves as if he were at home. Eva is a little scared and so she pretends to be a chance passerby who can't go any further because of her injured ankle. The boy offers her a bed for the night. He also fetches some plum brandy, they drink toasts to each other, and Eva starts to play Patience.—NFA.cz

title: Qingchun
plot: After her senses are surgically restored, a formerly deaf mute teenager enlists in the army and is assigned to communications work. But her inexperience with even such simple tasks as answering a telephone lead her supervisor to conclude she is incompetent, and try to have her reassigned. However, a courageous action by another soldier leads him to reevaluate his judgment.—Laowai

title: Reincidente
plot: Ramon Antonio Brizuela is a criminal whose life passes between rounds, parties and showdowns. Recognized by a witness during an assault, he is taken to jail where he becomes aware of the unfair and corrupt judicial system.

title: Rentre c'est bon
plot: A grand orgy in a Dordogne castle is wrapped in a story about a sect that prefers spiritual love over physical love.

title: The Name Was SN
plot: José Abreu "Guanipa" is transferred to the Guasina camp in the Orinoco Delta. There, he recalls the torture he was subjected to by SN (National Security) henchmen in order to obtain information about the resistance.

title: The Singer and the Dancer
plot: An elderly woman who is treated as a simple-minded invalid, periodically escapes to sit by the river and listen to the races on her radio. There she befriends Charlie, a woman who has come to seek a new life in the country.

title: Spiel der Verlierer
plot: Kluth, a married shipper in his fifties falls in love with Anita, a fifteen year old girl. She is the daughter of a pub owner. Kluth is a frequent guest at the pub. The parents of Anita condone the relationship because of Kluth's financial position.—Ulf Kjell Gür

title: Swedish Sorority Girls
plot: This story is about the managers of a Swedish hostel/inn and their relationship with an American woman that visits it on vacation. As they spend time together, the activities they share become increasingly intimate. Soon they introduce her to their closest friends and parties. They become very close, but eventually the vacation ends and they must part, promising to see each other again.—Don

title: The Terrorist
plot: Julio is an experienced terrorist. Now he is putting together a new team for the assassination of the prime minister. .

title: Around the World with Bolek and Lolek
plot: Bolek and Lolek race around the world facing danger to win a wager with Lord Fogg.

title: All About Gloria Leonard
plot: Based on the memoirs of its star, Gloria Leonard, this film showcases her personal and professional lives, from her early days as a ballet-school student, art dealer and stockbroker to her time as a porn actress and then to her 15-year stint as editor, writer and publisher of the adult magazine "High Society".—frankfob2@yahoo.com

title: Auf freiem Fuss
plot: About a sensitive craftsman's apprentice who fails in the world of work and his ambitions, based on the first autobiographical novel by the Austrian author and former unskilled worker Gernot Wolfgruber.

title: Borrasca
plot: With the fall of the spanish monarchy and the proclamation of the republic, a small town finds itself in turmoil in a power struggle through the eyes of a teacher.

title: By Hook and by Crook
plot: Shao Chan has the worst luck. It's so bad, he ends up in jail by accident. He escapes after learning of a buried fortune. He hopes finding it will change his luck. However, he learns it's another scheme, this one could cost him his life.

title: Det faller ett träd
plot: "A Tree Falls" - A green jungle path leads to a small village outside the city of Shagamo in Nigeria. Kadidja lives here. She is nine years old and belongs to the Yoruba people.

title: Double Your Pleasure
plot: Flamboyant Texas millionaire Hubie Haliday hires a hip young private eye to find his two missing wayward identical twin sister nieces, who Haliday suspects stole a considerable sum of his money when they ran away. The private eye searches New York City for the two ladies.—Woodyanders

title: Dráma a vadászaton
plot: Based on Chekhov's short story is the story of a strange love quadrangle. Both the village magistrate Kamishev and the Count, the lord of the local estate, are attracted to Olenka, the forester's daughter. But Olenka is the fiancée of the Count's steward, Urbedin. And she marries him... The men are inflamed with passion over the girl, and their passions eventually lead to murder.

title: The Exhibitor
plot: A swimming trainer who loses his job decides to become an exhibitor.

title: Fountains of Lust
plot: An Italian count travels to Greece and discovers a magical cave with water that enhances sexual vitality. The count engages in a flurry of activity, pleasing his wife, mistress, and a young hotel maid.

title: The Walls of Freedom
plot: An Argentine actor comes to Sweden. He has a pictured Sweden as a paradise. From his small rented room he is trying in vain to make contact with the Swedes.

title: Isolation of 1/880,000
plot: An elegiac ode to a loner who finds it difficult to fit in and the inevitable eruption of his frustration, Isolation of 1/880000 tells the story of Takemitsu, a disabled young man caught in the "examination hell" of trying to get into one of Japan's top universities. Director Sogo Ishii (now renamed as Gakuryu Ishii) was the original 8mm punk, whose works expressed unhinged energy and made speed, intensity and rebellion their stylistic and thematic center, carrying over into his later 16mm and 35mm films such as Crazy Thunder Road and Crazy Family. In contrast, Isolation prefigures the more ethereal aesthetic of his big budget 1990s films.—Harvard Film Archive

title: Da Ming ying lie
plot: The year is 1366. The emperor makes a deal with a neighboring Manchu emperor, leading to a plot to frame patriotic General Shung in a court martial. Shung believes he will receive a fair trial and goes along willingly. But some of his supporters are not so trusting, and they shadow him on his journey to the palace & now the trouble really starts.

title: Hierba salvaje
plot: A gasoline station attendant meets a childhood friend who gets into trouble. He promises to help him out, but it soon turns out he has ulterior motives.

title: Ich will euch sehen
plot: Winter 1941 The German soldier Fritz Schmenkel, disappointed in the war, crosses the front line in the forests of the Smolensk region. Here he meets a partisan detachment. Partisans are skeptical at first, do not trust him. Soon, the attitude towards Shmenkel changes dramatically - he participates in dangerous operations, goes behind the front line as a scout. Partisans call him "Vanya." Fritz Shmenkel awarded the Order of the Red Banner. In 1943, Fritz fell into the hands of the Nazis, he was executed. Posthumously awarded the title "Hero of the Soviet Union".—zoroman2008

title: Ja jsem stena smrti
plot: A van and a motorbike crash on a crossroad. Fortunately nobody was injured and there is not any damage. The parties of the accident - and oldish stuntman and a rider on the wall of death Piskácek (Josef Kemr) and a young motorbike driver Milan (Lubomír Paulovic) - only tell off each other. The motor biker for whom life means speed is not happy with his work in the factory. Out of curiosity he comes to see Piskácek's performance. There he meets his daughter Esmeralda (Eva Sitteová) and in the end he joins them as an assistant in this wandering business.—NFA.cz

title: Jugando a papás
plot: Leonor and Juan are an upper-class married couple. Both live very happily even though they are unable to have children.

title: Kisses
plot: An artistic anthology of film clips showing a wide and wild variety of kisses, edited into a visual poem about love.

title: Kärleksön
plot: Katrin (Leena Hiltonen) - a young erotic and primitive teenager - spends her summertime at a little island in the Stockholm archipelago. She spends most of her time sitting up in a tree "peeping" at the island's inmates as they're having sex. Sometimes she climbs down her tree to participate in some of the really sleazy love acts.—Stefan Nylen <red@defekt.cinemacabre.se>

title: Man måste ju leva...
plot: The saw mill closes down. Nils becomes unemployed. In order to cope with his family's needs, he is forced to travel south. His wife Karin and the children will stay in the village until further notice. Nils starts working at a factory.

title: El maravilloso mundo del sexo
plot: To cheer up the evening, three friends, owners of a marriage agency, put into practice with their acquaintances everything they see in erotic films.

title: Ondées brûlantes
plot: Two young couples meet to watch footage of an X-rated film set on a luxury boat. Before long they find themselves turned on and neglect the film in favor of each other.

title: Rage
plot: Fred Willamson is back and in a Blind Rage! Five blind master killers pull off the most unbelievable heist of all time.

title: La sombra de un recuerdo
plot: The city is horrified by the appearance of several corpses of women who have been savagely raped. Suspicions of such horrible crimes point to a psychopath who chooses his victims among beautiful young women.

title: Suave, cariño, muy suave
plot: Luis is a seller of beauty products for women. He is attractive and manly but very shy, which increases his attractiveness and popularity among his clients.

title: Temperament Unsuited
plot: A student teacher doesn't accept the teaching methods to be found in a traditional school situation, or the way the principal runs the show. He decides to explore alternative strategies.

title: Venus de fuego
plot: Un joven se enamora perdidamente de una mujer a la que llaman La Venus de Fuego y por ella se ve envuelto en un crimen. Lo acusan de asesinato y se ve obligado a huir a un lugar bien alejado.

title: Winterspelt 1944
plot: The film is set in September 1944, when a Wehrmacht officer tries to surrender his unit, stationed in the German Eifel village of Winterspelt, to nearby American forces.

title: Adolescentes au pensionnat
plot: The beautiful young students at a girls' college are continually trying to seduce their male teachers. Due to financial problems the school is forced to go coed, and when the male pupils start to arrive, the girls turn their attentions to them.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

title: Anna cuisses entrouvertes
plot: A chance ménage à trois at a Parisian bar leads to a series of sexual encounters in a luxurious country house.

title: Annapurna, premier 8000 à ski
plot: Through the images of a climb at Annapurna, a mountain in the Himalayas in Nepal, the film draws comparisons between the Nepalese spirituality and the philosophy of an alpinist from the Western culture.

title: Gli anni struggenti
plot: In the early sixties the world was fascinated with Texas culture. Two young lovers meet and live out the philosophy of the timeless Texan American artist Dustin Barnes.

title: Así es Vietnam
plot: Military invention in Vietnam 1955 to 1975.

title: A Baroness and Her Servant
plot: Baroness Jill returns home as a radiant young woman after having completed boarding school. She reminisces her past experiences and makes a couple of new ones.

title: Beauty Becomes the Beast
